1033  &x_index_global_to_local_map) const;

2319  size_type n;

2325  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> Tind;
2326 
2331  std::vector<
2332  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>>
2333  Sigma_P;

2339  std::vector<RkMatrix<Number> *> Sigma_R;
2340 
2345  std::vector<LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *> Sigma_F;

2348 
2357 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2358 void
2359 InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(
2360  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat,
2361  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node)
2362 {
2366  hmat.bc_node =
2367  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2368  bc_node);
2369 
2374  hmat.row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2375  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2376  .get_tau_node()
2377  ->get_data_reference()
2378  .get_index_set()));
2379  hmat.col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2380  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2381  .get_sigma_node()
2382  ->get_data_reference()
2383  .get_index_set()));
2384 
2388  hmat.m = hmat.row_indices->size();
2389  hmat.n = hmat.col_indices->size();
2390 
2391  hmat.Sigma_P.clear();
2392  hmat.Sigma_R.clear();
2393  hmat.Sigma_F.clear();
2394 }
2395 
2396 
2406 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2407 void
2408 InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(
2409  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat,
2410  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2411  const std::vector<std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *,
2412  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>> & Sigma_P)
2413 {
2417  hmat.bc_node =
2418  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2419  bc_node);
2420 
2425  hmat.row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2426  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2427  .get_tau_node()
2428  ->get_data_reference()
2429  .get_index_set()));
2430  hmat.col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2431  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2432  .get_sigma_node()
2433  ->get_data_reference()
2434  .get_index_set()));
2435 
2439  hmat.m = hmat.row_indices->size();
2440  hmat.n = hmat.col_indices->size();
2441 
2442  for (std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
2443  &hmat_pair : Sigma_P)
2444  {
2445  hmat.Sigma_P.push_back(hmat_pair);
2446  }
2447 
2448  hmat.Sigma_R.clear();
2449  hmat.Sigma_F.clear();
2450 }
2451 
2452 
2462 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2463 void
2464 InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(
2465  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat,
2466  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2467  const std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
2468  &hmat_pair)
2469 {
2473  hmat.bc_node =
2474  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2475  bc_node);
2476 
2481  hmat.row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2482  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2483  .get_tau_node()
2484  ->get_data_reference()
2485  .get_index_set()));
2486  hmat.col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2487  &(hmat.bc_node->get_data_reference()
2488  .get_sigma_node()
2489  ->get_data_reference()
2490  .get_index_set()));
2491 
2495  hmat.m = hmat.row_indices->size();
2496  hmat.n = hmat.col_indices->size();
2497 
2498  hmat.Sigma_P.push_back(hmat_pair);
2499  hmat.Sigma_R.clear();
2500  hmat.Sigma_F.clear();
2501 }
2502 
2503 
2514 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2515 void
2516 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildrenWithoutAlloc(
2517  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
2518  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2519  const bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
2520 {
2524  hmat->bc_node =
2525  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2526  bc_node);
2527 
2532  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2533  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2534  .get_tau_node()
2535  ->get_data_reference()
2536  .get_index_set()));
2537  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2538  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2539  .get_sigma_node()
2540  ->get_data_reference()
2541  .get_index_set()));
2542 
2546  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
2547  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
2548 
2549  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
2550  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
2551  {
2556  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
2557 
2561  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
2562  {
2566  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
2567  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
2568 
2569  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildrenWithoutAlloc(
2570  child_hmat,
2571  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
2572  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
2573 
2577  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
2578 
2583  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
2584 
2585  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
2586  }
2587  }
2588  else
2589  {
2590  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
2591  {
2596  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2597  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
2598  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2599  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
2600  }
2601 
2611  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
2612  {
2613  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
2614  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>();
2615  }
2616  else
2617  {
2618  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
2619  hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>();
2620  }
2621  }
2622 }
2623 
2624 
2638 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2639 void
2640 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
2641  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
2642  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2643  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k,
2644  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
2645 {
2649  hmat->bc_node =
2650  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2651  bc_node);
2652 
2657  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2658  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2659  .get_tau_node()
2660  ->get_data_reference()
2661  .get_index_set()));
2662  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2663  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2664  .get_sigma_node()
2665  ->get_data_reference()
2666  .get_index_set()));
2667 
2671  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
2672  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
2673 
2674  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
2675  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
2676  {
2681  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
2682 
2686  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
2687  {
2691  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
2692  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
2693 
2694  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
2695  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
2696  fixed_rank_k,
2697  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
2698 
2702  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
2703 
2708  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
2709 
2710  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
2711  }
2712  }
2713  else
2714  {
2715  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
2716  {
2721  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2722  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
2723  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2724  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
2725  }
2726 
2736  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
2737  {
2738  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
2739  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
2740  }
2741  else
2742  {
2743  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
2744 
2745  if (fixed_rank_k == 0)
2746  {
2747  // When the given rank is zero, an empty rank-k matrix is created,
2748  // whose memory is left for further allocation.
2749  hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>();
2750  }
2751  else
2752  {
2753  hmat->rkmatrix =
2754  new RkMatrix<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n, fixed_rank_k);
2755  }
2756  }
2757  }
2758 }
2759 
2760 
2782 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2783 void
2784 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
2785  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
2786  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2787  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k,
2788  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M,
2789  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
2790 {
2794  hmat->bc_node =
2795  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2796  bc_node);
2797 
2801  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2802  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2803  .get_tau_node()
2804  ->get_data_reference()
2805  .get_index_set()));
2806  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2807  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2808  .get_sigma_node()
2809  ->get_data_reference()
2810  .get_index_set()));
2811 
2815  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
2816  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
2817 
2818  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
2819 
2820  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
2821  {
2827  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
2828 
2829  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
2830  {
2834  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
2835  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
2836 
2837  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
2838  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
2839  fixed_rank_k,
2840  M,
2841  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
2842 
2846  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
2847 
2852  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
2853 
2854  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
2855  }
2856  }
2857  else
2858  {
2859  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
2860  {
2865  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2866  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
2867  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
2868  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
2869  }
2870 
2880  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
2881  {
2882  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
2883  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
2884 
2888  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < hmat->m; i++)
2889  {
2890  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < hmat->n; j++)
2891  {
2892  (*hmat->fullmatrix)(i, j) =
2893  M(hmat->row_indices->at(i), hmat->col_indices->at(j));
2894  }
2895  }
2896  }
2897  else
2898  {
2899  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
2900  hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat->row_indices),
2901  *(hmat->col_indices),
2902  fixed_rank_k,
2903  M);
2904  }
2905  }
2906 }
2907 
2908 
2931 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
2932 void
2933 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
2934  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
2935  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
2936  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M,
2937  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
2938 {
2942  hmat->bc_node =
2943  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
2944  bc_node);
2945 
2949  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2950  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2951  .get_tau_node()
2952  ->get_data_reference()
2953  .get_index_set()));
2954  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
2955  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
2956  .get_sigma_node()
2957  ->get_data_reference()
2958  .get_index_set()));
2959 
2963  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
2964  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
2965 
2966  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
2967 
2968  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
2969  {
2975  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
2976 
2977  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
2978  {
2982  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
2983  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
2984 
2985  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
2986  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
2987  M,
2988  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
2989 
2993  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
2994 
2999  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
3000 
3001  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
3002  }
3003  }
3004  else
3005  {
3006  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
3007  {
3012  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3013  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
3014  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3015  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3016  }
3017 
3027  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3028  {
3029  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
3030  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
3031 
3035  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < hmat->m; i++)
3036  {
3037  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < hmat->n; j++)
3038  {
3039  (*hmat->fullmatrix)(i, j) =
3040  M(hmat->row_indices->at(i), hmat->col_indices->at(j));
3041  }
3042  }
3043  }
3044  else
3045  {
3046  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
3047  hmat->rkmatrix =
3048  new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat->row_indices), *(hmat->col_indices), M);
3049  }
3050  }
3051 }
3052 
3053 
3082 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
3083 void
3084 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
3085  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
3086  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
3087  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k,
3088  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M,
3089  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
3090  &row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3091  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
3092  & col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3093  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
3094 {
3098  hmat->bc_node =
3099  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
3100  bc_node);
3101 
3105  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3106  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3107  .get_tau_node()
3108  ->get_data_reference()
3109  .get_index_set()));
3110  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3111  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3112  .get_sigma_node()
3113  ->get_data_reference()
3114  .get_index_set()));
3115 
3119  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
3120  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
3121 
3122  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
3123 
3124  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
3125  {
3131  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
3132 
3133  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
3134  {
3138  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
3139  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
3140 
3141  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
3142  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
3143  fixed_rank_k,
3144  M,
3145  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3146  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3147  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
3148 
3152  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
3153 
3158  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
3159 
3160  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
3161  }
3162  }
3163  else
3164  {
3165  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
3166  {
3171  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3172  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
3173  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3174  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3175  }
3176 
3186  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3187  {
3188  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
3189  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
3190 
3194  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < hmat->m; i++)
3195  {
3196  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < hmat->n; j++)
3197  {
3198  (*hmat->fullmatrix)(i, j) =
3199  M(row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M.at(
3200  hmat->row_indices->at(i)),
3201  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M.at(
3202  hmat->col_indices->at(j)));
3203  }
3204  }
3205  }
3206  else
3207  {
3208  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
3209  hmat->rkmatrix =
3210  new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat->row_indices),
3211  *(hmat->col_indices),
3212  fixed_rank_k,
3213  M,
3214  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3215  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M);
3216  }
3217  }
3218 }
3219 
3220 
3249 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
3250 void
3251 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
3252  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
3253  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
3254  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M,
3255  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
3256  &row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3257  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
3258  & col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3259  bool is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map = true)
3260 {
3264  hmat->bc_node =
3265  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
3266  bc_node);
3267 
3271  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3272  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3273  .get_tau_node()
3274  ->get_data_reference()
3275  .get_index_set()));
3276  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3277  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3278  .get_sigma_node()
3279  ->get_data_reference()
3280  .get_index_set()));
3281 
3285  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
3286  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
3287 
3288  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
3289 
3290  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
3291  {
3297  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
3298 
3299  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
3300  {
3304  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
3305  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
3306 
3307  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
3308  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
3309  M,
3310  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3311  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3312  is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map);
3313 
3317  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
3318 
3323  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
3324 
3325  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
3326  }
3327  }
3328  else
3329  {
3330  if (is_build_index_set_global_to_local_map)
3331  {
3336  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3337  *(hmat->row_indices), hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map);
3338  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3339  *(hmat->col_indices), hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3340  }
3341 
3351  if (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3352  {
3353  hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
3354  hmat->fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(hmat->m, hmat->n);
3355 
3359  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < hmat->m; i++)
3360  {
3361  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < hmat->n; j++)
3362  {
3363  (*hmat->fullmatrix)(i, j) =
3364  M(row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M.at(
3365  hmat->row_indices->at(i)),
3366  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M.at(
3367  hmat->col_indices->at(j)));
3368  }
3369  }
3370  }
3371  else
3372  {
3373  hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
3374  hmat->rkmatrix =
3375  new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat->row_indices),
3376  *(hmat->col_indices),
3377  M,
3378  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_M,
3379  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_M);
3380  }
3381  }
3382 }
3383 
3384 
3396 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
3397 void
3398 InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(
3399  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat,
3400  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
3401  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> && H)
3402 {
3406  hmat->bc_node =
3407  const_cast<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
3408  bc_node);
3409 
3414  hmat->row_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3415  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3416  .get_tau_node()
3417  ->get_data_reference()
3418  .get_index_set()));
3419  hmat->col_indices = const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3420  &(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3421  .get_sigma_node()
3422  ->get_data_reference()
3423  .get_index_set()));
3424 
3428  hmat->m = hmat->row_indices->size();
3429  hmat->n = hmat->col_indices->size();
3430 
3431  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = bc_node->get_child_num();
3432 
3433  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
3434  {
3439  hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
3440 
3444  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
3445  {
3449  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
3450  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
3451 
3452  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(child_hmat,
3453  bc_node->get_child_pointer(i),
3454  std::move(H));
3455 
3459  hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
3460 
3465  child_hmat->parent = hmat;
3466 
3467  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
3468  }
3469  }
3470  else
3471  {
3476  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *matched_source_hmat = *(
3477  H.find_block_cluster_in_leaf_set(hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()));
3482  (*hmat) = std::move(*matched_source_hmat);
3483  }
3484 }
3485 
3486 
3501 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
3502 void
3503 RefineHMatrixWrtExtendedBlockClusterTree(
3504  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *starting_hmat,
3505  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *current_hmat)
3506 {
3515  Assert((starting_hmat->type == FullMatrixType) ||
3516  (starting_hmat->type == RkMatrixType),
3517  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(starting_hmat->type));
3518 
3526  const unsigned int bc_node_child_num = current_hmat->bc_node->get_child_num();
3527 
3528  if (bc_node_child_num > 0)
3529  {
3540  if (current_hmat != starting_hmat)
3541  {
3542  current_hmat->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
3543  }
3544 
3545  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bc_node_child_num; i++)
3546  {
3552  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat =
3553  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
3554 
3555  current_hmat->submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
3556 
3561  child_hmat->bc_node = const_cast<
3562  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>(
3563  current_hmat->bc_node->get_child_pointer(i));
3564 
3569  child_hmat->row_indices =
3570  const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3571  &(child_hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3572  .get_tau_node()
3573  ->get_data_reference()
3574  .get_index_set()));
3575  child_hmat->col_indices =
3576  const_cast<std::vector<types::global_dof_index> *>(
3577  &(child_hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference()
3578  .get_sigma_node()
3579  ->get_data_reference()
3580  .get_index_set()));
3581 
3586  child_hmat->m = child_hmat->row_indices->size();
3587  child_hmat->n = child_hmat->col_indices->size();
3588 
3593  child_hmat->parent = current_hmat;
3594 
3595  child_hmat->submatrix_index = i;
3596 
3600  RefineHMatrixWrtExtendedBlockClusterTree(starting_hmat, child_hmat);
3601  }
3602  }
3603  else
3604  {
3609  if (current_hmat == starting_hmat)
3610  {
3616  }
3617  else
3618  {
3630  if (current_hmat->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3631  {
3632  current_hmat->type = FullMatrixType;
3633 
3640  switch (starting_hmat->type)
3641  {
3642  case FullMatrixType:
3643  {
3644  current_hmat->fullmatrix =
3645  new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(
3646  *(current_hmat->row_indices),
3647  *(current_hmat->col_indices),
3648  *(starting_hmat->fullmatrix),
3649  starting_hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3650  starting_hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3651 
3652  break;
3653  }
3654  case RkMatrixType:
3655  {
3656  current_hmat->fullmatrix =
3657  new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>();
3658  starting_hmat->rkmatrix->restrictToFullMatrix(
3659  *(current_hmat->row_indices),
3660  *(current_hmat->col_indices),
3661  starting_hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3662  starting_hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map,
3663  *(current_hmat->fullmatrix));
3664 
3665  break;
3666  }
3667  default:
3668  {
3669  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(starting_hmat->type));
3670 
3671  break;
3672  }
3673  }
3674  }
3675  else
3676  {
3677  current_hmat->type = RkMatrixType;
3678 
3683  switch (starting_hmat->type)
3684  {
3685  case FullMatrixType:
3686  {
3687  current_hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
3688  *(current_hmat->row_indices),
3689  *(current_hmat->col_indices),
3690  *(starting_hmat->fullmatrix),
3691  starting_hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3692  starting_hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3693 
3694  break;
3695  }
3696  case RkMatrixType:
3697  {
3698  current_hmat->rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
3699  *(current_hmat->row_indices),
3700  *(current_hmat->col_indices),
3701  *(starting_hmat->rkmatrix),
3702  starting_hmat->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3703  starting_hmat->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3704 
3705  break;
3706  }
3707  default:
3708  {
3709  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(starting_hmat->type));
3710 
3711  break;
3712  }
3713  }
3714  }
3715  }
3716  }
3717 
3722 }
3723 
3724 
3776 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
3777 void
3778 convertHMatBlockToRkMatrix(
3779  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * hmat_block,
3780  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k,
3781  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *hmat_root_block = nullptr,
3782  size_t * calling_counter = nullptr,
3783  const std::string &output_file_base_name = std::string("hmat-bct"))
3784 {
3790  using size_type = typename HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::size_type;
3791 
3792  Assert(hmat_block->type != UndefinedMatrixType,
3793  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat_block->type));
3794 
3795  if (hmat_block->bc_node->is_leaf())
3796  {
3801  if (hmat_block->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3802  {
3810  Assert(hmat_block->type == FullMatrixType,
3811  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat_block->type));
3812  }
3813  else
3814  {
3821  Assert(hmat_block->type == RkMatrixType,
3822  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat_block->type));
3823 
3824  hmat_block->rkmatrix->truncate_to_rank(fixed_rank_k);
3825  }
3826  }
3827  else
3828  {
3834  for (auto submatrix : hmat_block->submatrices)
3835  {
3836  convertHMatBlockToRkMatrix(submatrix,
3837  fixed_rank_k,
3838  hmat_root_block,
3839  calling_counter,
3840  output_file_base_name);
3841  }
3842 
3843  if (hmat_block->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
3844  {
3897  for (const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix :
3898  hmat_block->submatrices)
3899  {
3900  Assert(submatrix->type == FullMatrixType,
3901  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(submatrix->type));
3902  }
3903 
3908  if (hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
3909  {
3910  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3911  *(hmat_block->row_indices),
3912  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map);
3913  }
3914 
3919  if (hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
3920  {
3921  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
3922  *(hmat_block->col_indices),
3923  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map);
3924  }
3925 
3926  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *fullmatrix;
3927 
3928  switch (hmat_block->bc_node->get_split_mode())
3929  {
3930  case CrossSplitMode:
3931  {
3932  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 4);
3933 
3934  fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(
3935  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3936  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
3937  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix),
3938  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
3939  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
3940  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix),
3941  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
3942  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
3943  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->fullmatrix),
3944  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->row_indices),
3945  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->col_indices),
3946  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->fullmatrix),
3947  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->row_indices),
3948  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->col_indices));
3949 
3950  break;
3951  }
3952  case HorizontalSplitMode:
3953  {
3954  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 2);
3955 
3956  fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(
3957  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3958  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
3959  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix),
3960  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
3961  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
3962  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix),
3963  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
3964  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
3965  true);
3966 
3967  break;
3968  }
3969  case VerticalSplitMode:
3970  {
3971  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 2);
3972 
3973  fullmatrix = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(
3974  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
3975  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
3976  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix),
3977  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
3978  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
3979  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix),
3980  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
3981  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
3982  false);
3983 
3984  break;
3985  }
3986  default:
3987  {
3988  Assert(
3989  false,
3990  ExcMessage(
3991  std::string("Invalid block cluster splitting mode: ") +
3992  std::to_string(hmat_block->bc_node->get_split_mode())));
3993  }
3994  }
3995 
3996  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : hmat_block->submatrices)
3997  {
3998  if (submatrix != nullptr)
3999  {
4000  delete submatrix;
4001  }
4002  }
4003  hmat_block->submatrices.clear();
4004 
4005  hmat_block->fullmatrix = fullmatrix;
4006  hmat_block->type = FullMatrixType;
4007  }
4008  else
4009  {
4016  RkMatrix<Number> *rkmatrix;
4017 
4022  if (hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4023  {
4024  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
4025  *(hmat_block->row_indices),
4026  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map);
4027  }
4028 
4033  if (hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4034  {
4035  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
4036  *(hmat_block->col_indices),
4037  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map);
4038  }
4039 
4040  switch (hmat_block->bc_node->get_split_mode())
4041  {
4042  case CrossSplitMode:
4043  {
4044  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 4);
4045 
4046  if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == RkMatrixType &&
4047  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == RkMatrixType &&
4048  hmat_block->submatrices[2]->type == RkMatrixType &&
4049  hmat_block->submatrices[3]->type == RkMatrixType)
4050  {
4056  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4057  fixed_rank_k,
4058  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4059  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4060  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->rkmatrix),
4061  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4062  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4063  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->rkmatrix),
4064  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4065  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4066  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->rkmatrix),
4067  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->row_indices),
4068  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->col_indices),
4069  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->rkmatrix),
4070  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->row_indices),
4071  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->col_indices));
4072  }
4073  else if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4074  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4075  hmat_block->submatrices[2]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4076  hmat_block->submatrices[3]->type == FullMatrixType)
4077  {
4084  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix11(
4085  fixed_rank_k,
4086  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix));
4087  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix12(
4088  fixed_rank_k,
4089  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix));
4090  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix21(
4091  fixed_rank_k,
4092  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->fullmatrix));
4093  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix22(
4094  fixed_rank_k,
4095  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->fullmatrix));
4096 
4097  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4098  fixed_rank_k,
4099  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4100  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4101  rkmatrix11,
4102  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4103  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4104  rkmatrix12,
4105  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4106  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4107  rkmatrix21,
4108  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->row_indices),
4109  *(hmat_block->submatrices[2]->col_indices),
4110  rkmatrix22,
4111  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->row_indices),
4112  *(hmat_block->submatrices[3]->col_indices));
4113  }
4114  else
4115  {
4119  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
4120  }
4121 
4122  break;
4123  }
4124  case HorizontalSplitMode:
4125  {
4126  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 2);
4127 
4128  if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == RkMatrixType &&
4129  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == RkMatrixType)
4130  {
4136  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4137  fixed_rank_k,
4138  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4139  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4140  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->rkmatrix),
4141  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4142  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4143  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->rkmatrix),
4144  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4145  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4146  true);
4147  }
4148  else if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4149  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == FullMatrixType)
4150  {
4157  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix1(
4158  fixed_rank_k,
4159  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix));
4160  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix2(
4161  fixed_rank_k,
4162  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix));
4163 
4164  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4165  fixed_rank_k,
4166  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4167  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4168  rkmatrix1,
4169  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4170  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4171  rkmatrix2,
4172  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4173  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4174  true);
4175  }
4176  else
4177  {
4181  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
4182  }
4183 
4184  break;
4185  }
4186  case VerticalSplitMode:
4187  {
4188  AssertDimension(hmat_block->submatrices.size(), 2);
4189 
4190  if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == RkMatrixType &&
4191  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == RkMatrixType)
4192  {
4198  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4199  fixed_rank_k,
4200  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4201  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4202  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->rkmatrix),
4203  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4204  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4205  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->rkmatrix),
4206  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4207  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4208  false);
4209  }
4210  else if (hmat_block->submatrices[0]->type == FullMatrixType &&
4211  hmat_block->submatrices[1]->type == FullMatrixType)
4212  {
4219  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix1(
4220  fixed_rank_k,
4221  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->fullmatrix));
4222  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix2(
4223  fixed_rank_k,
4224  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->fullmatrix));
4225 
4226  rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(
4227  fixed_rank_k,
4228  hmat_block->row_index_global_to_local_map,
4229  hmat_block->col_index_global_to_local_map,
4230  rkmatrix1,
4231  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->row_indices),
4232  *(hmat_block->submatrices[0]->col_indices),
4233  rkmatrix2,
4234  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->row_indices),
4235  *(hmat_block->submatrices[1]->col_indices),
4236  false);
4237  }
4238  else
4239  {
4243  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
4244  }
4245 
4246  break;
4247  }
4248  default:
4249  {
4250  Assert(
4251  false,
4252  ExcMessage(
4253  std::string("Invalid block cluster splitting mode: ") +
4254  std::to_string(hmat_block->bc_node->get_split_mode())));
4255  }
4256  }
4257 
4258  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : hmat_block->submatrices)
4259  {
4260  if (submatrix != nullptr)
4261  {
4262  delete submatrix;
4263  }
4264  }
4265  hmat_block->submatrices.clear();
4266 
4267  hmat_block->rkmatrix = rkmatrix;
4268  hmat_block->type = RkMatrixType;
4269  }
4270 
4276  if (hmat_root_block != nullptr && calling_counter != nullptr)
4277  {
4278  std::ofstream output_stream(
4279  output_file_base_name + std::to_string(*calling_counter) + ".dat");
4280  hmat_root_block->write_leaf_set(output_stream);
4281  output_stream.close();
4282 
4283  (*calling_counter) = (*calling_counter) + 1;
4284  }
4285  }
4290 }
4291 
4292 
4322 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4323 void
4324 h_rk_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
4325  const RkMatrix<Number> & M2,
4326  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4327 {
4328  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m);
4329 
4335  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_A(M2.A.m());
4336  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
4337 
4342  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.n, M2.formal_rank);
4343  M.B = M2.B;
4344 
4348  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4349  {
4350  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
4351  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4352  }
4353 
4354  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4355  {
4356  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
4357  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4358  }
4359 
4364  for (size_t j = 0; j < M2.formal_rank; j++)
4365  {
4366  M2.A.get_column(j, col_vect_in_A);
4367  result_vect = 0.;
4368  M1.vmult(result_vect,
4369  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4370  col_vect_in_A,
4371  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4372 
4376  M.A.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4377  }
4378 }
4379 
4380 
4412 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4413 void
4414 h_rk_mmult(const Number alpha,
4415  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
4416  const RkMatrix<Number> & M2,
4417  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4418 {
4419  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m);
4420 
4426  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_A(M2.A.m());
4427  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
4428 
4433  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.n, M2.formal_rank);
4434  M.B = M2.B;
4435 
4439  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4440  {
4441  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
4442  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4443  }
4444 
4445  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4446  {
4447  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
4448  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4449  }
4450 
4455  for (size_t j = 0; j < M2.formal_rank; j++)
4456  {
4457  M2.A.get_column(j, col_vect_in_A);
4462  result_vect = 0.;
4463  M1.vmult(result_vect,
4464  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4465  alpha,
4466  col_vect_in_A,
4467  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4468 
4472  M.A.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4473  }
4474 }
4475 
4476 
4507 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4508 void
4509 h_rk_mTmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
4510  const RkMatrix<Number> & M2,
4511  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4512 {
4513  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n);
4514 
4520  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M2.B.m());
4521  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
4522 
4527  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.m, M2.formal_rank);
4528  M.B = M2.A;
4529 
4533  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4534  {
4535  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
4536  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4537  }
4538 
4539  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4540  {
4541  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
4542  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4543  }
4544 
4549  for (size_t j = 0; j < M2.formal_rank; j++)
4550  {
4551  M2.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4552  result_vect = 0.;
4553  M1.vmult(result_vect,
4554  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4555  col_vect_in_B,
4556  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4557 
4561  M.A.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4562  }
4563 }
4564 
4565 
4598 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4599 void
4600 h_rk_mTmult(const Number alpha,
4601  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
4602  const RkMatrix<Number> & M2,
4603  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4604 {
4605  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n);
4606 
4612  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M2.B.m());
4613  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
4614 
4619  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.m, M2.formal_rank);
4620  M.B = M2.A;
4621 
4625  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4626  {
4627  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
4628  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4629  }
4630 
4631  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4632  {
4633  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
4634  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4635  }
4636 
4641  for (size_t j = 0; j < M2.formal_rank; j++)
4642  {
4643  M2.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4644  result_vect = 0.;
4645  M1.vmult(result_vect,
4646  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4647  alpha,
4648  col_vect_in_B,
4649  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4650 
4654  M.A.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4655  }
4656 }
4657 
4658 
4667 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4668 void
4669 h_rk_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M1,
4670  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M2,
4671  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
4672  bool is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P = true)
4673 {
4674  Assert(M2->type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M2->type));
4675  Assert(M2->rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
4676  // Assert(*(M1->col_indices) == *(M2->row_indices),
4677  // ExcMessage("Incompatible index sets during matrix
4678  // multiplication"));
4679  AssertDimension(M1->n, M2->m);
4680 
4681  // DEBUG
4682  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", *M1, "M2", *M2);
4683 
4684  if (is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P)
4685  {
4686  M->Sigma_P.pop_back();
4687  }
4688  else
4689  {
4690  M->remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(M1, M2);
4691  }
4692 
4693  RkMatrix<Number> *M_rk = new RkMatrix<Number>();
4694  h_rk_mmult(*M1, *(M2->rkmatrix), *M_rk);
4695  M->Sigma_R.push_back(M_rk);
4696 
4697  // // DEBUG
4698  // LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M_rk_to_full;
4699  // M_rk->convertToFullMatrix(M_rk_to_full);
4700  // M_rk_to_full.print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
4701 
4702  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_F.size(), 0);
4703  M->type = RkMatrixType;
4704 }
4705 
4706 
4736 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4737 void
4738 rk_h_mmult(const RkMatrix<Number> & M1,
4739  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
4740  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4741 {
4742  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m);
4743 
4749  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M1.B.m());
4750  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.n);
4751 
4756  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.n, M1.formal_rank);
4757  M.A = M1.A;
4758 
4762  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4763  {
4764  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
4765  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4766  }
4767 
4768  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4769  {
4770  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
4771  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4772  }
4773 
4778  for (size_t j = 0; j < M.formal_rank; j++)
4779  {
4780  M1.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4781  result_vect = 0.;
4782  M2.Tvmult(result_vect,
4783  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map,
4784  col_vect_in_B,
4785  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4786 
4790  M.B.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4791  }
4792 }
4793 
4794 
4826 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4827 void
4828 rk_h_mmult(const Number alpha,
4829  const RkMatrix<Number> & M1,
4830  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
4831  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4832 {
4833  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m);
4834 
4840  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M1.B.m());
4841  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.n);
4842 
4847  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.n, M1.formal_rank);
4848  M.A = M1.A;
4849 
4853  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4854  {
4855  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
4856  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4857  }
4858 
4859  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4860  {
4861  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
4862  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4863  }
4864 
4869  for (size_t j = 0; j < M.formal_rank; j++)
4870  {
4871  M1.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4876  result_vect = 0.;
4877  M2.Tvmult(result_vect,
4878  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map,
4879  alpha,
4880  col_vect_in_B,
4881  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4882 
4886  M.B.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4887  }
4888 }
4889 
4890 
4919 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
4920 void
4921 rk_h_mTmult(const RkMatrix<Number> & M1,
4922  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
4923  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
4924 {
4925  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n);
4926 
4932  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M1.B.m());
4933  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.m);
4934 
4939  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.m, M1.formal_rank);
4940  M.A = M1.A;
4941 
4945  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4946  {
4947  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
4948  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
4949  }
4950 
4951  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
4952  {
4953  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
4954  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4955  }
4956 
4961  for (size_t j = 0; j < M.formal_rank; j++)
4962  {
4963  M1.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
4964  result_vect = 0.;
4965  M2.vmult(result_vect,
4966  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map,
4967  col_vect_in_B,
4968  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
4969 
4973  M.B.fill_col(j, result_vect);
4974  }
4975 }
4976 
4977 
5007 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5008 void
5009 rk_h_mTmult(const Number alpha,
5010  const RkMatrix<Number> & M1,
5011  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
5012  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5013 {
5014  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n);
5015 
5021  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_B(M1.B.m());
5022  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.m);
5023 
5028  M.reinit(M1.m, M2.m, M1.formal_rank);
5029  M.A = M1.A;
5030 
5034  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5035  {
5036  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
5037  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5038  }
5039 
5040  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5041  {
5042  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
5043  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5044  }
5045 
5050  for (size_t j = 0; j < M.formal_rank; j++)
5051  {
5052  M1.B.get_column(j, col_vect_in_B);
5053  result_vect = 0.;
5054  M2.vmult(result_vect,
5055  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5056  alpha,
5057  col_vect_in_B,
5058  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5059 
5063  M.B.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5064  }
5065 }
5066 
5067 
5076 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5077 void
5078 rk_h_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M1,
5079  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M2,
5080  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
5081  bool is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P = true)
5082 {
5083  Assert(M1->type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M1->type));
5084  Assert(M1->rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
5085  // Assert(*(M1->col_indices) == *(M2->row_indices),
5086  // ExcMessage("Incompatible index sets during matrix
5087  // multiplication"));
5088  AssertDimension(M1->n, M2->m);
5089 
5090  // // DEBUG
5091  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", *M1, "M2", *M2);
5092 
5093  if (is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P)
5094  {
5095  M->Sigma_P.pop_back();
5096  }
5097  else
5098  {
5099  M->remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(M1, M2);
5100  }
5101 
5102  RkMatrix<Number> *M_rk = new RkMatrix<Number>();
5103  rk_h_mmult(*(M1->rkmatrix), *M2, *M_rk);
5104  M->Sigma_R.push_back(M_rk);
5105 
5106  // // DEBUG
5107  // LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M_rk_to_full;
5108  // M_rk->convertToFullMatrix(M_rk_to_full);
5109  // M_rk_to_full.print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5110 
5111  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_F.size(), 0);
5112  M->type = RkMatrixType;
5113 }
5114 
5115 
5125 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5126 void
5127 h_f_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5128  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5129  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5130 {
5131  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m());
5132 
5133  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_M2(M2.m());
5134  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
5135 
5136  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m;
5137  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.n();
5138 
5142  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5143  {
5144  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
5145  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5146  }
5147 
5148  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5149  {
5150  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
5151  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5152  }
5153 
5154  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5155  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type j = 0; j < n_cols; j++)
5156  {
5157  M2.get_column(j, col_vect_in_M2);
5158  result_vect = 0.;
5159  M1.vmult(result_vect,
5160  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5161  col_vect_in_M2,
5162  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5163  M.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5164  }
5165 }
5166 
5167 
5179 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5180 void
5181 h_f_mmult(const Number alpha,
5182  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5183  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5184  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5185 {
5186  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m());
5187 
5188  Vector<Number> col_vect_in_M2(M2.m());
5189  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
5190 
5191  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m;
5192  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.n();
5193 
5197  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5198  {
5199  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
5200  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5201  }
5202 
5203  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5204  {
5205  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
5206  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5207  }
5208 
5209  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5210  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type j = 0; j < n_cols; j++)
5211  {
5212  M2.get_column(j, col_vect_in_M2);
5213  result_vect = 0.;
5214  M1.vmult(result_vect,
5215  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5216  alpha,
5217  col_vect_in_M2,
5218  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5219  M.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5220  }
5221 }
5222

5234 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5235 void
5236 h_f_mTmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5237  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5238  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5239 {
5240  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n());
5241 
5242  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M2(M2.n());
5243  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
5244 
5245  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m;
5246  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.m();
5247 
5251  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5252  {
5253  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
5254  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5255  }
5256 
5257  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5258  {
5259  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
5260  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5261  }
5262 
5263  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5264  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type j = 0; j < n_cols; j++)
5265  {
5266  M2.get_row(j, row_vect_in_M2);
5267  result_vect = 0.;
5268  M1.vmult(result_vect,
5269  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5270  row_vect_in_M2,
5271  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5272  M.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5273  }
5274 }

5288 void
5289 h_f_mTmult(const Number alpha,
5290  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5291  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5292  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5293 {
5294  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n());
5295 
5296  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M2(M2.n());
5297  Vector<Number> result_vect(M1.m);
5298 
5299  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m;
5300  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.m();
5301 
5305  if (M1.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5306  {
5307  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.row_indices),
5308  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5309  }
5310 
5311  if (M1.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5312  {
5313  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M1.col_indices),
5314  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5315  }
5316 
5317  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5318  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type j = 0; j < n_cols; j++)
5319  {
5320  M2.get_row(j, row_vect_in_M2);
5321  result_vect = 0.;
5322  M1.vmult(result_vect,
5323  M1.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5324  alpha,
5325  row_vect_in_M2,
5326  M1.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5327  M.fill_col(j, result_vect);
5328  }
5329 }

5345 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5346 void
5347 h_f_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5348  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5349  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5350 {
5351  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m());
5352 
5356  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M2_copy(M2);
5357 
5361  RkMatrix<Number> M2_rk(M2_copy);
5362 
5363  h_rk_mmult(M1, M2_rk, M);
5364 }

5383 void
5384 h_f_mmult(const Number alpha,
5385  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5386  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5387  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5388 {
5389  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.m());
5390 
5394  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M2_copy(M2);
5395 
5399  RkMatrix<Number> M2_rk(M2_copy);
5400 
5401  h_rk_mmult(alpha, M1, M2_rk, M);
5402 }

5420 void
5421 h_f_mTmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5422  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5423  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5424 {
