5456 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5457 void
5458 h_f_mTmult(const Number alpha,
5459  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M1,
5460  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M2,
5461  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5462 {
5463  AssertDimension(M1.n, M2.n());
5464 
5468  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M2_copy(M2);
5469 
5473  RkMatrix<Number> M2_rk(M2_copy);
5474 
5475  h_rk_mTmult(alpha, M1, M2_rk, M);
5476 }
5477 
5478 
5488 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5489 void
5490 h_f_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M1,
5491  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M2,
5492  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
5493  bool is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P = true)
5494 {
5495  Assert(M2->type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M2->type));
5496  Assert(M2->fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
5497  // Assert(*(M1->col_indices) == *(M2->row_indices),
5498  // ExcMessage("Incompatible index sets during matrix
5499  // multiplication"));
5500  AssertDimension(M1->n, M2->m);
5501 
5502  // // DEBUG
5503  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", *M1, "M2", *M2);
5504 
5505  if (is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P)
5506  {
5507  M->Sigma_P.pop_back();
5508  }
5509  else
5510  {
5511  M->remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(M1, M2);
5512  }
5513 
5514  if (M->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
5515  {
5519  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *M_full = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>();
5520  h_f_mmult(*M1, *(M2->fullmatrix), *M_full);
5521  M->Sigma_F.push_back(M_full);
5522 
5523  // // DEBUG
5524  // M_full->print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5525 
5526  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_R.size(), 0);
5527  M->type = FullMatrixType;
5528  }
5529  else
5530  {
5534  RkMatrix<Number> *M_rk = new RkMatrix<Number>();
5535  h_f_mmult(*M1, *(M2->fullmatrix), *M_rk);
5536  M->Sigma_R.push_back(M_rk);
5537 
5538  // // DEBUG
5539  // LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M_rk_to_full;
5540  // M_rk->convertToFullMatrix(M_rk_to_full);
5541  // M_rk_to_full.print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5542 
5543  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_F.size(), 0);
5544  M->type = RkMatrixType;
5545  }
5546 }
5547 
5548 
5556 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5557 void
5558 f_h_mmult(const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5559  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5560  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5561 {
5562  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.m);
5563 
5564  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M1(M1.n());
5565  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.n);
5566 
5567  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m();
5568  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.n;
5569 
5573  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5574  {
5575  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
5576  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5577  }
5578 
5579  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5580  {
5581  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
5582  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5583  }
5584 
5585  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5586  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type i = 0; i < n_rows; i++)
5587  {
5588  M1.get_row(i, row_vect_in_M1);
5589  result_vect = 0.;
5590  M2.Tvmult(result_vect,
5591  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map,
5592  row_vect_in_M1,
5593  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5594  M.fill_row(i, result_vect);
5595  }
5596 }
5597 
5598 
5608 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5609 void
5610 f_h_mmult(const Number alpha,
5611  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5612  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5613  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5614 {
5615  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.m);
5616 
5617  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M1(M1.n());
5618  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.n);
5619 
5620  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m();
5621  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.n;
5622 
5626  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5627  {
5628  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
5629  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5630  }
5631 
5632  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5633  {
5634  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
5635  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5636  }
5637 
5638  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5639  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type i = 0; i < n_rows; i++)
5640  {
5641  M1.get_row(i, row_vect_in_M1);
5646  result_vect = 0.;
5647  M2.Tvmult(result_vect,
5648  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map,
5649  alpha,
5650  row_vect_in_M1,
5651  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5652  M.fill_row(i, result_vect);
5653  }
5654 }
5655 
5656 
5665 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5666 void
5667 f_h_mTmult(const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5668  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5669  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5670 {
5671  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.n);
5672 
5673  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M1(M1.n());
5674  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.m);
5675 
5676  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m();
5677  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.m;
5678 
5682  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5683  {
5684  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
5685  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5686  }
5687 
5688  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5689  {
5690  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
5691  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5692  }
5693 
5694  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5695  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type i = 0; i < n_rows; i++)
5696  {
5697  M1.get_row(i, row_vect_in_M1);
5698  result_vect = 0.;
5699  M2.vmult(result_vect,
5700  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5701  row_vect_in_M1,
5702  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5703  M.fill_row(i, result_vect);
5704  }
5705 }
5706 
5707 
5717 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5718 void
5719 f_h_mTmult(const Number alpha,
5720  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5721  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5722  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
5723 {
5724  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.n);
5725 
5726  Vector<Number> row_vect_in_M1(M1.n());
5727  Vector<Number> result_vect(M2.m);
5728 
5729  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_rows = M1.m();
5730  const typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type n_cols = M2.m;
5731 
5735  if (M2.row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5736  {
5737  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.row_indices),
5738  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map);
5739  }
5740 
5741  if (M2.col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
5742  {
5743  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(M2.col_indices),
5744  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5745  }
5746 
5747  M.reinit(n_rows, n_cols);
5748  for (typename LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>::size_type i = 0; i < n_rows; i++)
5749  {
5750  M1.get_row(i, row_vect_in_M1);
5751  result_vect = 0.;
5752  M2.vmult(result_vect,
5753  M2.row_index_global_to_local_map,
5754  alpha,
5755  row_vect_in_M1,
5756  M2.col_index_global_to_local_map);
5757  M.fill_row(i, result_vect);
5758  }
5759 }
5760 
5761 
5770 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5771 void
5772 f_h_mmult(const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5773  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5774  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5775 {
5776  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.m);
5777 
5782  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M1_copy(M1);
5783  RkMatrix<Number> M1_rk(M1_copy);
5784  rk_h_mmult(M1_rk, M2, M);
5785 }
5786 
5787 
5797 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5798 void
5799 f_h_mmult(const Number alpha,
5800  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5801  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5802  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5803 {
5804  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.m);
5805 
5810  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M1_copy(M1);
5811  RkMatrix<Number> M1_rk(M1_copy);
5812  rk_h_mmult(alpha, M1_rk, M2, M);
5813 }
5814 
5815 
5824 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5825 void
5826 f_h_mTmult(const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5827  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5828  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5829 {
5830  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.n);
5831 
5836  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M1_copy(M1);
5837  RkMatrix<Number> M1_rk(M1_copy);
5838  rk_h_mTmult(M1_rk, M2, M);
5839 }
5840 
5841 
5851 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5852 void
5853 f_h_mTmult(const Number alpha,
5854  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &M1,
5855  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M2,
5856  RkMatrix<Number> & M)
5857 {
5858  AssertDimension(M1.n(), M2.n);
5859 
5864  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M1_copy(M1);
5865  RkMatrix<Number> M1_rk(M1_copy);
5866  rk_h_mTmult(alpha, M1_rk, M2, M);
5867 }
5868 
5869 
5879 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5880 void
5881 f_h_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M1,
5882  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M2,
5883  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
5884  bool is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P = true)
5885 {
5886  Assert(M1->type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M1->type));
5887  Assert(M1->fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
5888  // Assert(*(M1->col_indices) == *(M2->row_indices),
5889  // ExcMessage("Incompatible index sets during matrix
5890  // multiplication"));
5891  AssertDimension(M1->n, M2->m);
5892 
5893  // DEBUG
5894  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", *M1, "M2", *M2);
5895 
5896  if (is_M1M2_last_in_M_Sigma_P)
5897  {
5898  M->Sigma_P.pop_back();
5899  }
5900  else
5901  {
5902  M->remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(M1, M2);
5903  }
5904 
5905  if (M->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
5906  {
5910  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *M_full = new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>();
5911  f_h_mmult(*(M1->fullmatrix), *M2, *M_full);
5912  M->Sigma_F.push_back(M_full);
5913 
5914  // // DEBUG
5915  // M_full->print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5916 
5917  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_R.size(), 0);
5918  M->type = FullMatrixType;
5919  }
5920  else
5921  {
5925  RkMatrix<Number> *M_rk = new RkMatrix<Number>();
5926  f_h_mmult(*(M1->fullmatrix), *M2, *M_rk);
5927  M->Sigma_R.push_back(M_rk);
5928 
5929  // // DEBUG
5930  // LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> M_rk_to_full;
5931  // M_rk->convertToFullMatrix(M_rk_to_full);
5932  // M_rk_to_full.print_formatted(std::cout, 8, false, 16, "0");
5933 
5934  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_F.size(), 0);
5935  M->type = RkMatrixType;
5936  }
5937 }
5938 
5939 
5940 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
5941 void
5942 h_h_mmult_phase1_recursion(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> * M,
5943  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &Tind)
5944 {
5945  M->h_h_mmult_reduction();
5946 
5947  if (M->Sigma_P.size() > 0)
5948  {
5953  TreeNodeSplitMode split_mode_of_mm =
5954  M->determine_mm_split_mode_from_Sigma_P();
5955 
5956  switch (split_mode_of_mm)
5957  {
5958  case HorizontalSplitMode:
5959  {
5960  M->h_h_mmult_horizontal_split(Tind);
5961 
5962  Assert(
5963  false,
5964  ExcMessage(
5965  "For level conserving H-matrix multiplication, HorizontalSplitMode should not appear!"));
5966 
5967  break;
5968  }
5969  case VerticalSplitMode:
5970  {
5971  M->h_h_mmult_vertical_split(Tind);
5972 
5973  Assert(
5974  false,
5975  ExcMessage(
5976  "For level conserving H-matrix multiplication, VerticalSplitMode should not appear!"));
5977 
5978  break;
5979  }
5980  case CrossSplitMode:
5981  {
5982  M->h_h_mmult_cross_split(Tind);
5983 
5984  break;
5985  }
5986  default:
5987  {
5988  Assert(
5989  false,
5990  ExcMessage(
5991  "Inconsistent case met during H-matrix MM multiplication"));
5992 
5993  break;
5994  }
5995  }
5996 
6004  AssertDimension(M->Sigma_P.size(), 0);
6005  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : M->submatrices)
6006  {
6007  h_h_mmult_phase1_recursion(submatrix, Tind);
6008  }
6009  }
6010 }
6011 
6012 
6013 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
6014 void
6015 h_h_mmult_phase2(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & M,
6016  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &target_bc_tree,
6017  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
6018 {
6022  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *hmat : M.leaf_set)
6023  {
6029  AssertDimension(hmat->Sigma_P.size(), 0);
6030 
6031  if (hmat->Sigma_R.size() > 0 && hmat->Sigma_F.size() == 0)
6032  {
6033  Assert(hmat->type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat->type));
6034 
6041  Assert(
6042  hmat->rkmatrix == nullptr,
6043  ExcMessage(
6044  "The pointer hmat->rkmatrix should be nullptr before the following assignment:\n\nhmat->rkmatrix = hmat->Sigma_R[0];\n"));
6045  hmat->rkmatrix = hmat->Sigma_R[0];
6046  for (size_t i = 1; i < hmat->Sigma_R.size(); i++)
6047  {
6048  hmat->rkmatrix->add(*(hmat->Sigma_R[i]), fixed_rank);
6049  delete hmat->Sigma_R[i];
6050  hmat->Sigma_R[i] = nullptr;
6051  }
6052 
6057  hmat->Sigma_R.clear();
6058  }
6059  else if (hmat->Sigma_R.size() == 0 && hmat->Sigma_F.size() > 0)
6060  {
6061  Assert(hmat->type == FullMatrixType,
6062  ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat->type));
6063 
6064  Assert(
6065  hmat->fullmatrix == nullptr,
6066  ExcMessage(
6067  "The pointer hmat->fullmatrix should be nullptr before the following assignment:\n\nhmat->fullmatrix = hmat->Sigma_F[0];\n"));
6068  hmat->fullmatrix = hmat->Sigma_F[0];
6069  for (size_t i = 1; i < hmat->Sigma_F.size(); i++)
6070  {
6071  hmat->fullmatrix->add(*(hmat->Sigma_F[i]));
6072  delete hmat->Sigma_F[i];
6073  hmat->Sigma_F[i] = nullptr;
6074  }
6075 
6080  hmat->Sigma_F.clear();
6081  }
6082  else
6083  {
6084  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6085  }
6086  }
6087 
6093  M.distribute_all_non_leaf_nodes_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(fixed_rank);
6094 
6098  M.convert_between_different_block_cluster_trees(M.Tind,
6099  target_bc_tree,
6100  fixed_rank);
6101 }
6102 
6103 
6122 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
6123 void
6124 h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
6125  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
6126  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
6127  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
6128  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
6129 {
6130  Assert(M0.bc_node->is_leaf(), ExcMessage("M0 should be a leaf node!"));
6131 
6132  // Array of empty child pointers used for initializing a block
6133  // cluster tree node.
6134  const std::array<
6135  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type,
6136  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::child_num>
6137  empty_child_pointers{nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr};
6138 
6144  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_value_type
6145  current_product_bc_node(
6146  BlockCluster<spacedim, Number>(
6147  M1.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
6148  M2.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()),
6149  0,
6150  empty_child_pointers,
6151  nullptr,
6152  UnsplitMode);
6153 
6160  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6161  {
6162  Assert(M0.type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6163 
6164  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(true);
6165  }
6166  else
6167  {
6168  Assert(M0.type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6169 
6170  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(false);
6171  }
6172 
6178  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(&current_product_bc_node, fixed_rank);
6179  // Local variable storing the rank-k matrix obtained from multiplication
6180  // involving leaf node.
6181  RkMatrix<Number> ZR;
6182  // Local variable storing the full matrix obtained from multiplication
6183  // involving leaf node.
6184  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> ZF;
6185  // The result matrix type for the multiplication involving leaf node.
6186  HMatrixType result_matrix_type;
6187 
6188  if (M1.bc_node->is_leaf() || M2.bc_node->is_leaf())
6189  {
6194  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
6195  {
6196  rk_h_mmult(*(M1.rkmatrix), M2, ZR);
6197  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6198  }
6199  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
6200  {
6201  h_rk_mmult(M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), ZR);
6202  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6203  }
6204  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
6205  {
6206  f_h_mmult(*(M1.fullmatrix), M2, ZF);
6207  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6208  }
6209  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
6210  {
6211  h_f_mmult(M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), ZF);
6212  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6213  }
6214  else
6215  {
6216  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6217  }
6218 
6219  if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
6220  {
6221  // The desired result should be a rank-k matrix.
6222  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6223  {
6224  *(Z.rkmatrix) = ZR;
6225  }
6226  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6227  {
6228  // Convert the full matrix to rank-k matrix.
6229  *(Z.rkmatrix) = RkMatrix<Number>(fixed_rank, ZF);
6230  }
6231  else
6232  {
6233  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6234  }
6235  }
6236  else if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
6237  {
6238  // The desired result should be a full matrix.
6239  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6240  {
6241  // Convert the rank-k matrix to full matrix.
6242  ZR.convertToFullMatrix(*(Z.fullmatrix));
6243  }
6244  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6245  {
6246  *(Z.fullmatrix) = ZF;
6247  }
6248  else
6249  {
6250  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6251  }
6252  }
6253  else
6254  {
6255  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(Z.type));
6256  }
6257  }
6258  else
6259  {
6266  const unsigned int local_fixed_rank =
6267  std::min(fixed_rank * 2, std::min(Z.m, Z.n));
6268 
6269  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6270  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[0]), *(M2.submatrices[0]), local_fixed_rank);
6271  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6272  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[1]), *(M2.submatrices[2]), local_fixed_rank);
6273  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6274  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[0]), *(M2.submatrices[1]), local_fixed_rank);
6275  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6276  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[1]), *(M2.submatrices[3]), local_fixed_rank);
6277  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6278  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[2]), *(M2.submatrices[0]), local_fixed_rank);
6279  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6280  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[3]), *(M2.submatrices[2]), local_fixed_rank);
6281  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6282  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[2]), *(M2.submatrices[1]), local_fixed_rank);
6283  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(
6284  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[3]), *(M2.submatrices[3]), local_fixed_rank);
6285  }
6286 
6290  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6291  {
6296  Assert(M.fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6297 
6298  M.fullmatrix->fill(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6299  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6300  *(Z.fullmatrix),
6301  *(Z.row_indices),
6302  *(Z.col_indices),
6303  true);
6304  }
6305  else
6306  {
6313  Assert(M.rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6314 
6315  M.rkmatrix->assemble_from_rkmatrix(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6316  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6317  *(Z.rkmatrix),
6318  *(Z.row_indices),
6319  *(Z.col_indices),
6320  fixed_rank);
6321  // // DEBUG
6322  // std::cout << "M.rkmatrix: [";
6323  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M.row_indices), ",", false);
6324  // std::cout << "],[";
6325  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M1.col_indices), ",", false);
6326  // std::cout << "],[";
6327  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M.col_indices), ",", false);
6328  // std::cout << "] assembled from [";
6329  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(Z.row_indices), ",", false);
6330  // std::cout << "],[";
6331  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(Z.col_indices), ",", false);
6332  // std::cout << "]\n";
6333  // std::cout << "M.rkmatrix: formal_rank=" <<
6334  // M.rkmatrix->get_formal_rank()
6335  // << ", rank=" << M.rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
6336  }
6337 }
6338 
6339 
6358 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
6359 void
6360 h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
6361  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
6362  const Number alpha,
6363  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
6364  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
6365  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
6366 {
6367  // DEBUG
6368  // std::cout << "h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node: ";
6369  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", M1, "M2", M2);
6370  // std::cout << " = ";
6371  // print_h_submatrix_accessor(std::cout, "M", M);
6372  // std::cout << std::endl;
6373 
6374  Assert(M0.bc_node->is_leaf(), ExcMessage("M0 should be a leaf node!"));
6375 
6376  // Array of empty child pointers used for initializing a block
6377  // cluster tree node.
6378  const std::array<
6379  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type,
6380  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::child_num>
6381  empty_child_pointers{nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr};
6382 
6388  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_value_type
6389  current_product_bc_node(
6390  BlockCluster<spacedim, Number>(
6391  M1.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
6392  M2.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()),
6393  0,
6394  empty_child_pointers,
6395  nullptr,
6396  UnsplitMode);
6397 
6404  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6405  {
6406  Assert(M0.type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6407 
6408  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(true);
6409  }
6410  else
6411  {
6412  Assert(M0.type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6413 
6414  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(false);
6415  }
6416 
6422  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(&current_product_bc_node, fixed_rank);
6423  // Local variable storing the rank-k matrix obtained from multiplication
6424  // involving leaf node.
6425  RkMatrix<Number> ZR;
6426  // Local variable storing the full matrix obtained from multiplication
6427  // involving leaf node.
6428  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> ZF;
6429  // The result matrix type for the multiplication involving leaf node.
6430  HMatrixType result_matrix_type;
6431 
6432  if (M1.bc_node->is_leaf() || M2.bc_node->is_leaf())
6433  {
6438  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
6439  {
6440  rk_h_mmult(alpha, *(M1.rkmatrix), M2, ZR);
6441  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6442  }
6443  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
6444  {
6445  h_rk_mmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), ZR);
6446  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6447  }
6448  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
6449  {
6450  f_h_mmult(alpha, *(M1.fullmatrix), M2, ZF);
6451  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6452  }
6453  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
6454  {
6455  h_f_mmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), ZF);
6456  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6457  }
6458  else
6459  {
6460  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6461  }
6462 
6463  if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
6464  {
6465  // The desired result should be a rank-k matrix.
6466  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6467  {
6468  *(Z.rkmatrix) = ZR;
6469  }
6470  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6471  {
6472  // Convert the full matrix to rank-k matrix.
6473  *(Z.rkmatrix) = RkMatrix<Number>(fixed_rank, ZF);
6474  }
6475  else
6476  {
6477  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6478  }
6479  }
6480  else if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
6481  {
6482  // The desired result should be a full matrix.
6483  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6484  {
6485  // Convert the rank-k matrix to full matrix.
6486  ZR.convertToFullMatrix(*(Z.fullmatrix));
6487  }
6488  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6489  {
6490  *(Z.fullmatrix) = ZF;
6491  }
6492  else
6493  {
6494  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6495  }
6496  }
6497  else
6498  {
6499  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(Z.type));
6500  }
6501  }
6502  else
6503  {
6510  const unsigned int local_fixed_rank =
6511  std::min(fixed_rank * 2, std::min(Z.m, Z.n));
6512 
6513  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6514  Z,
6515  alpha,
6516  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
6517  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
6518  local_fixed_rank);
6519  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6520  Z,
6521  alpha,
6522  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
6523  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
6524  local_fixed_rank);
6525  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6526  Z,
6527  alpha,
6528  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
6529  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
6530  local_fixed_rank);
6531  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6532  Z,
6533  alpha,
6534  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
6535  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
6536  local_fixed_rank);
6537  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6538  Z,
6539  alpha,
6540  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
6541  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
6542  local_fixed_rank);
6543  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6544  Z,
6545  alpha,
6546  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
6547  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
6548  local_fixed_rank);
6549  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6550  Z,
6551  alpha,
6552  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
6553  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
6554  local_fixed_rank);
6555  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6556  Z,
6557  alpha,
6558  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
6559  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
6560  local_fixed_rank);
6561  }
6562 
6566  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6567  {
6572  Assert(M.fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6573 
6574  M.fullmatrix->fill(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6575  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6576  *(Z.fullmatrix),
6577  *(Z.row_indices),
6578  *(Z.col_indices),
6579  true);
6580  }
6581  else
6582  {
6589  Assert(M.rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6590 
6591  // DEBUG
6592  // Z.rkmatrix->print_formatted_to_mat(std::cout, "Z", 15, false, 25,
6593  // "0");
6594 
6595  M.rkmatrix->assemble_from_rkmatrix(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6596  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6597  *(Z.rkmatrix),
6598  *(Z.row_indices),
6599  *(Z.col_indices),
6600  fixed_rank);
6601  }
6602 }
6603 
6604 
6622 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
6623 void
6624 h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
6625  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
6626  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
6627  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
6628  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
6629 {
6630  Assert(M0.bc_node->is_leaf(), ExcMessage("M0 should be a leaf node!"));
6631 
6632  // Array of empty child pointers used for initializing a block
6633  // cluster tree node.
6634  const std::array<
6635  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type,
6636  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::child_num>
6637  empty_child_pointers{nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr};
6638 
6644  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_value_type
6645  current_product_bc_node(BlockCluster<spacedim, Number>(
6646  M1.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
6647  M2.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()),
6648  0,
6649  empty_child_pointers,
6650  nullptr,
6651  UnsplitMode);
6652 
6659  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6660  {
6661  Assert(M0.type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6662 
6663  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(true);
6664  }
6665  else
6666  {
6667  Assert(M0.type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6668 
6669  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(false);
6670  }
6671 
6677  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(&current_product_bc_node, fixed_rank);
6678  // Local variable storing the rank-k matrix obtained from multiplication
6679  // involving leaf node.
6680  RkMatrix<Number> ZR;
6681  // Local variable storing the full matrix obtained from multiplication
6682  // involving leaf node.
6683  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> ZF;
6684  // The result matrix type for the multiplication involving leaf node.
6685  HMatrixType result_matrix_type;
6686 
6687  if (M1.bc_node->is_leaf() || M2.bc_node->is_leaf())
6688  {
6693  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
6694  {
6695  rk_h_mTmult(*(M1.rkmatrix), M2, ZR);
6696  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6697  }
6698  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
6699  {
6700  h_rk_mTmult(M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), ZR);
6701  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6702  }
6703  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
6704  {
6705  f_h_mTmult(*(M1.fullmatrix), M2, ZF);
6706  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6707  }
6708  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
6709  {
6710  h_f_mTmult(M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), ZF);
6711  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6712  }
6713  else
6714  {
6715  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6716  }
6717 
6718  if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
6719  {
6720  // The desired result should be a rank-k matrix.
6721  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6722  {
6723  *(Z.rkmatrix) = ZR;
6724  }
6725  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6726  {
6727  // Convert the full matrix to rank-k matrix.
6728  *(Z.rkmatrix) = RkMatrix<Number>(fixed_rank, ZF);
6729  }
6730  else
6731  {
6732  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6733  }
6734  }
6735  else if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
6736  {
6737  // The desired result should be a full matrix.
6738  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6739  {
6740  // Convert the rank-k matrix to full matrix.
6741  ZR.convertToFullMatrix(*(Z.fullmatrix));
6742  }
6743  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6744  {
6745  *(Z.fullmatrix) = ZF;
6746  }
6747  else
6748  {
6749  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6750  }
6751  }
6752  else
6753  {
6754  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(Z.type));
6755  }
6756  }
6757  else
6758  {
6765  const unsigned int local_fixed_rank =
6766  std::min(fixed_rank * 2, std::min(Z.m, Z.n));
6767 
6768  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6769  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[0]), *(M2.submatrices[0]), local_fixed_rank);
6770  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6771  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[1]), *(M2.submatrices[1]), local_fixed_rank);
6772  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6773  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[0]), *(M2.submatrices[2]), local_fixed_rank);
6774  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6775  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[1]), *(M2.submatrices[3]), local_fixed_rank);
6776  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6777  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[2]), *(M2.submatrices[0]), local_fixed_rank);
6778  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6779  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[3]), *(M2.submatrices[1]), local_fixed_rank);
6780  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6781  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[2]), *(M2.submatrices[2]), local_fixed_rank);
6782  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(
6783  M0, Z, *(M1.submatrices[3]), *(M2.submatrices[3]), local_fixed_rank);
6784  }
6785 
6789  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6790  {
6795  Assert(M.fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6796 
6797  M.fullmatrix->fill(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6798  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6799  *(Z.fullmatrix),
6800  *(Z.row_indices),
6801  *(Z.col_indices),
6802  true);
6803  }
6804  else
6805  {
6812  Assert(M.rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
6813 
6814  M.rkmatrix->assemble_from_rkmatrix(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
6815  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
6816  *(Z.rkmatrix),
6817  *(Z.row_indices),
6818  *(Z.col_indices),
6819  fixed_rank);
6820  }
6821 }
6822 
6823 
6841 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
6842 void
6843 h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
6844  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
6845  const Number alpha,
6846  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
6847  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
6848  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
6849 {
6850  Assert(M0.bc_node->is_leaf(), ExcMessage("M0 should be a leaf node!"));
6851 
6852  // Array of empty child pointers used for initializing a block
6853  // cluster tree node.
6854  const std::array<
6855  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type,
6856  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::child_num>
6857  empty_child_pointers{nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr};
6858 
6864  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_value_type
6865  current_product_bc_node(BlockCluster<spacedim, Number>(
6866  M1.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
6867  M2.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()),
6868  0,
6869  empty_child_pointers,
6870  nullptr,
6871  UnsplitMode);
6872 
6879  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
6880  {
6881  Assert(M0.type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6882 
6883  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(true);
6884  }
6885  else
6886  {
6887  Assert(M0.type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(M0.type));
6888 
6889  current_product_bc_node.get_data_reference().set_is_near_field(false);
6890  }
6891 
6897  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(&current_product_bc_node, fixed_rank);
6898  // Local variable storing the rank-k matrix obtained from multiplication
6899  // involving leaf node.
6900  RkMatrix<Number> ZR;
6901  // Local variable storing the full matrix obtained from multiplication
6902  // involving leaf node.
6903  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> ZF;
6904  // The result matrix type for the multiplication involving leaf node.
6905  HMatrixType result_matrix_type;
6906 
6907  if (M1.bc_node->is_leaf() || M2.bc_node->is_leaf())
6908  {
6913  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
6914  {
6915  rk_h_mTmult(alpha, *(M1.rkmatrix), M2, ZR);
6916  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6917  }
6918  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
6919  {
6920  h_rk_mTmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), ZR);
6921  result_matrix_type = RkMatrixType;
6922  }
6923  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
6924  {
6925  f_h_mTmult(alpha, *(M1.fullmatrix), M2, ZF);
6926  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6927  }
6928  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
6929  {
6930  h_f_mTmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), ZF);
6931  result_matrix_type = FullMatrixType;
6932  }
6933  else
6934  {
6935  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
6936  }
6937 
6938  if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
6939  {
6940  // The desired result should be a rank-k matrix.
6941  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6942  {
6943  *(Z.rkmatrix) = ZR;
6944  }
6945  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6946  {
6947  // Convert the full matrix to rank-k matrix.
6948  *(Z.rkmatrix) = RkMatrix<Number>(fixed_rank, ZF);
6949  }
6950  else
6951  {
6952  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6953  }
6954  }
6955  else if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
6956  {
6957  // The desired result should be a full matrix.
6958  if (result_matrix_type == RkMatrixType)
6959  {
6960  // Convert the rank-k matrix to full matrix.
6961  ZR.convertToFullMatrix(*(Z.fullmatrix));
6962  }
6963  else if (result_matrix_type == FullMatrixType)
6964  {
6965  *(Z.fullmatrix) = ZF;
6966  }
6967  else
6968  {
6969  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(result_matrix_type));
6970  }
6971  }
6972  else
6973  {
6974  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(Z.type));
6975  }
6976  }
6977  else
6978  {
6985  const unsigned int local_fixed_rank =
6986  std::min(fixed_rank * 2, std::min(Z.m, Z.n));
6987 
6988  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6989  Z,
6990  alpha,
6991  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
6992  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
6993  local_fixed_rank);
6994  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
6995  Z,
6996  alpha,
6997  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
6998  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
6999  local_fixed_rank);
7000  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
7001  Z,
7002  alpha,
7003  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7004  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7005  local_fixed_rank);
7006  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
7007  Z,
7008  alpha,
7009  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7010  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7011  local_fixed_rank);
7012  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
7013  Z,
7014  alpha,
7015  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7016  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7017  local_fixed_rank);
7018  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
7019  Z,
7020  alpha,
7021  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7022  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7023  local_fixed_rank);
7024  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
7025  Z,
7026  alpha,
7027  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7028  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7029  local_fixed_rank);
7030  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M0,
7031  Z,
7032  alpha,
7033  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7034  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7035  local_fixed_rank);
7036  }
7037 
7041  if (M0.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field())
7042  {
7047  Assert(M.fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
7048 
7049  M.fullmatrix->fill(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
7050  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
7051  *(Z.fullmatrix),
7052  *(Z.row_indices),
7053  *(Z.col_indices),
7054  true);
7055  }
7056  else
7057  {
7064  Assert(M.rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
7065 
7066  M.rkmatrix->assemble_from_rkmatrix(M.row_index_global_to_local_map,
7067  M.col_index_global_to_local_map,
7068  *(Z.rkmatrix),
7069  *(Z.row_indices),
7070  *(Z.col_indices),
7071  fixed_rank);
7072  }
7073 }
7074 
7075 
7089 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7090 void
7091 h_h_mmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
7092  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
7093  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7094  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
7095  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
7096 {
7097  // // DEBUG
7098  // std::cout << "mmult: ([";
7099  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M1.row_indices), ",", false);
7100  // std::cout << "],[";
7101  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M1.col_indices), ",", false);
7102  // std::cout << "]) * ([";
7103  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M2.row_indices), ",", false);
7104  // std::cout << "],[";
7105  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M2.col_indices), ",", false);
7106  // std::cout << "]) = ([";
7107  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M.row_indices), ",", false);
7108  // std::cout << "],[";
7109  // print_vector_values(std::cout, *(M.col_indices), ",", false);
7110  // std::cout << "])" << std::endl;
7111 
7112  if (!(M1.bc_node->is_leaf()) && !(M2.bc_node->is_leaf()) &&
7113  !(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7114  {
7115  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7116  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7117  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7118  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7119  fixed_rank);
7120  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7121  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7122  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7123  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7124  fixed_rank);
7125  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7126  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7127  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7128  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7129  fixed_rank);
7130  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7131  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7132  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7133  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7134  fixed_rank);
7135  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7136  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7137  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7138  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7139  fixed_rank);
7140  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7141  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7142  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7143  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7144  fixed_rank);
7145  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7146  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7147  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7148  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7149  fixed_rank);
7150  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7151  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7152  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7153  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7154  fixed_rank);
7155  }
7156  else if (!(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7157  {
7158  RkMatrix<Number> Z;
7159  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
7160  {
7161  rk_h_mmult(*(M1.rkmatrix), M2, Z);
7162  }
7163  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
7164  {
7165  h_rk_mmult(M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), Z);
7166  }
7167  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
7168  {
7169  f_h_mmult(*(M1.fullmatrix), M2, Z);
7170  }
7171  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
7172  {
7173  h_f_mmult(M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), Z);
7174  }
7175  else
7176  {
7177  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
7178  }
7179 
7180  M.add(Z, fixed_rank);
7181  }
7182  else
7183  {
7184  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M, M, M1, M2, fixed_rank);
7185  }
7186 }
7187 
7188 
7204 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7205 void
7206 h_h_mmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
7207  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
7208  const Number alpha,
7209  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7210  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
7211  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
7212 {
7213  // DEBUG
7214  // std::cout << "h_h_mmult_level_conserving: ";
7215  // print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::cout, "M1", M1, "M2", M2);
7216  // std::cout << " = ";
7217  // print_h_submatrix_accessor(std::cout, "M", M);
7218  // std::cout << std::endl;
7219 
7220  if (!(M1.bc_node->is_leaf()) && !(M2.bc_node->is_leaf()) &&
7221  !(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7222  {
7223  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7224  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7225  alpha,
7226  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7227  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7228  fixed_rank);
7229  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7230  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7231  alpha,
7232  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7233  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7234  fixed_rank);
7235  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7236  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7237  alpha,
7238  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7239  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7240  fixed_rank);
7241  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7242  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7243  alpha,
7244  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7245  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7246  fixed_rank);
7247  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7248  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7249  alpha,
7250  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7251  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7252  fixed_rank);
7253  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7254  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7255  alpha,
7256  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7257  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7258  fixed_rank);
7259  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7260  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7261  alpha,
7262  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7263  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7264  fixed_rank);
7265  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(M0,
7266  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7267  alpha,
7268  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7269  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7270  fixed_rank);
7271  }
7272  else if (!(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7273  {
7274  RkMatrix<Number> Z;
7275  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
7276  {
7277  rk_h_mmult(alpha, *(M1.rkmatrix), M2, Z);
7278  }
7279  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
7280  {
7281  h_rk_mmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), Z);
7282  }
7283  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
7284  {
7285  f_h_mmult(alpha, *(M1.fullmatrix), M2, Z);
7286  }
7287  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
7288  {
7289  h_f_mmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), Z);
7290  }
7291  else
7292  {
7293  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
7294  }
7295 
7296  M.add(Z, fixed_rank);
7297  }
7298  else
7299  {
7300  h_h_mmult_from_leaf_node(M, M, alpha, M1, M2, fixed_rank);
7301  }
7302 }
7303 
7304 
7319 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7320 void
7321 h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
7322  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
7323  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7324  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
7325  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
7326 {
7327  if (!(M1.bc_node->is_leaf()) && !(M2.bc_node->is_leaf()) &&
7328  !(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7329  {
7330  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7331  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7332  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7333  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7334  fixed_rank);
7335  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7336  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7337  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7338  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7339  fixed_rank);
7340  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7341  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7342  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7343  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7344  fixed_rank);
7345  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7346  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7347  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7348  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7349  fixed_rank);
7350  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7351  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7352  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7353  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7354  fixed_rank);
7355  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7356  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7357  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7358  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7359  fixed_rank);
7360  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7361  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7362  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7363  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7364  fixed_rank);
7365  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7366  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7367  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7368  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7369  fixed_rank);
7370  }
7371  else if (!(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7372  {
7373  RkMatrix<Number> Z;
7374  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
7375  {
7376  rk_h_mTmult(*(M1.rkmatrix), M2, Z);
7377  }
7378  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
7379  {
7380  h_rk_mTmult(M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), Z);
7381  }
7382  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
7383  {
7384  f_h_mTmult(*(M1.fullmatrix), M2, Z);
7385  }
7386  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
7387  {
7388  h_f_mTmult(M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), Z);
7389  }
7390  else
7391  {
7392  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
7393  }
7394 
7395  M.add(Z, fixed_rank);
7396  }
7397  else
7398  {
7399  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M, M, M1, M2, fixed_rank);
7400  }
7401 }
7402 
7403 
7419 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7420 void
7421 h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M0,
7422  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M,
7423  const Number alpha,
7424  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7425  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2,
7426  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
7427 {
7428  if (!(M1.bc_node->is_leaf()) && !(M2.bc_node->is_leaf()) &&
7429  !(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7430  {
7431  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7432  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7433  alpha,
7434  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7435  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7436  fixed_rank);
7437  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7438  *(M.submatrices[0]),
7439  alpha,
7440  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7441  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7442  fixed_rank);
7443  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7444  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7445  alpha,
7446  *(M1.submatrices[0]),
7447  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7448  fixed_rank);
7449  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7450  *(M.submatrices[1]),
7451  alpha,
7452  *(M1.submatrices[1]),
7453  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7454  fixed_rank);
7455  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7456  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7457  alpha,
7458  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7459  *(M2.submatrices[0]),
7460  fixed_rank);
7461  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7462  *(M.submatrices[2]),
7463  alpha,
7464  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7465  *(M2.submatrices[1]),
7466  fixed_rank);
7467  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7468  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7469  alpha,
7470  *(M1.submatrices[2]),
7471  *(M2.submatrices[2]),
7472  fixed_rank);
7473  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(M0,
7474  *(M.submatrices[3]),
7475  alpha,
7476  *(M1.submatrices[3]),
7477  *(M2.submatrices[3]),
7478  fixed_rank);
7479  }
7480  else if (!(M.bc_node->is_leaf()))
7481  {
7482  RkMatrix<Number> Z;
7483  if (M1.type == RkMatrixType)
7484  {
7485  rk_h_mTmult(alpha, *(M1.rkmatrix), M2, Z);
7486  }
7487  else if (M2.type == RkMatrixType)
7488  {
7489  h_rk_mTmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.rkmatrix), Z);
7490  }
7491  else if (M1.type == FullMatrixType)
7492  {
7493  f_h_mTmult(alpha, *(M1.fullmatrix), M2, Z);
7494  }
7495  else if (M2.type == FullMatrixType)
7496  {
7497  h_f_mTmult(alpha, M1, *(M2.fullmatrix), Z);
7498  }
7499  else
7500  {
7501  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
7502  }
7503 
7504  M.add(Z, fixed_rank);
7505  }
7506  else
7507  {
7508  h_h_mTmult_from_leaf_node(M, M, alpha, M1, M2, fixed_rank);
7509  }
7510 }
7511 
7512 
7532 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7533 void
7534 copy_hmatrix_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat_dst,
7535  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &hmat_src)
7536 {
7537  hmat_dst.type = hmat_src.type;
7538  hmat_dst.submatrix_index = hmat_src.submatrix_index;
7539 
7543  if (hmat_src.rkmatrix != nullptr)
7544  {
7545  hmat_dst.rkmatrix = new RkMatrix<Number>(*(hmat_src.rkmatrix));
7546  }
7547  else
7548  {
7549  hmat_dst.rkmatrix = nullptr;
7550  }
7551 
7555  if (hmat_src.fullmatrix != nullptr)
7556  {
7557  hmat_dst.fullmatrix =
7558  new LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number>(*(hmat_src.fullmatrix));
7559  }
7560  else
7561  {
7562  hmat_dst.fullmatrix = nullptr;
7563  }
7564 
7565  hmat_dst.bc_node = hmat_src.bc_node;
7566  hmat_dst.row_indices = hmat_src.row_indices;
7567  hmat_dst.col_indices = hmat_src.col_indices;
7568  hmat_dst.row_index_global_to_local_map =
7569  hmat_src.row_index_global_to_local_map;
7570  hmat_dst.col_index_global_to_local_map =
7571  hmat_src.col_index_global_to_local_map;
7572  hmat_dst.m = hmat_src.m;
7573  hmat_dst.n = hmat_src.n;
7574 }
7575 
7576 
7584 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7585 void
7586 copy_hmatrix_node(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat_dst,
7587  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &&hmat_src)
7588 {
7589  hmat_dst.type = hmat_src.type;
7590  hmat_dst.submatrices = hmat_src.submatrices;
7591  hmat_dst.submatrix_index = hmat_src.submatrix_index;
7592  hmat_dst.parent = hmat_src.parent;
7593  hmat_dst.leaf_set = hmat_src.leaf_set;
7594  hmat_dst.rkmatrix = hmat_src.rkmatrix;
7595  hmat_dst.fullmatrix = hmat_src.fullmatrix;
7596  hmat_dst.bc_node = hmat_src.bc_node;
7597  hmat_dst.row_indices = hmat_src.row_indices;
7598  hmat_dst.col_indices = hmat_src.col_indices;
7599  hmat_dst.row_index_global_to_local_map =
7600  hmat_src.row_index_global_to_local_map;
7601  hmat_dst.col_index_global_to_local_map =
7602  hmat_src.col_index_global_to_local_map;
7603  hmat_dst.m = hmat_src.m;
7604  hmat_dst.n = hmat_src.n;
7605  hmat_dst.Sigma_P = hmat_src.Sigma_P;
7606  hmat_dst.Sigma_R = hmat_src.Sigma_R;
7607  hmat_dst.Sigma_F = hmat_src.Sigma_F;
7608  hmat_dst.Tind = std::move(hmat_src.Tind);
7609 }
7610 
7611 
7617 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7618 void
7619 copy_hmatrix(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & hmat_dst,
7620  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &hmat_src)
7621 {
7625  copy_hmatrix_node(hmat_dst, hmat_src);
7626 
7630  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : hmat_src.submatrices)
7631  {
7632  Assert(submatrix, ExcInternalError());
7633 
7639  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
7640  copy_hmatrix(*child_hmat, *submatrix);
7641  hmat_dst.submatrices.push_back(child_hmat);
7642  child_hmat->parent = &hmat_dst;
7643  }
7644 }
7645 
7646 
7647 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7648 void
7649 print_h_submatrix_accessor(std::ostream & out,
7650  const std::string & name,
7651  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M)
7652 {
7653  out << name + std::string("([") << std::flush;
7654  print_vector_values(out, *(M.row_indices), ",", false);
7655  out << "],[" << std::flush;
7656  print_vector_values(out, *(M.col_indices), ",", false);
7657  out << "])";
7658 }
7659 
7660 
7661 template <int spacedim, typename Number = double>
7662 void
7663 print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(std::ostream & out,
7664  const std::string & name1,
7665  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M1,
7666  const std::string & name2,
7667  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M2)
7668 {
7669  print_h_submatrix_accessor(out, name1, M1);
7670  out << " * ";
7671  print_h_submatrix_accessor(out, name2, M2);
7672 }
7673 
7674 
7675 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7676 void
7677 hmatrix_solve_lu(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &L,
7678  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &U,
7679  Vector<Number> & x,
7680  const Vector<Number> & b)
7681 {
7682  x = b;
7683  L.solve_by_forward_substitution(x, true);
7684  U.solve_by_backward_substitution(x, false);
7685 }
7686 
7687 
7688 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7689 void
7690 hmatrix_solve_cholesky(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &L,
7691  Vector<Number> & x,
7692  const Vector<Number> & b)
7693 {
7694  x = b;
7695  L.solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(x);
7696  L.solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(x);
7697 }
7698 
7699 
7700 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7701 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix()
7702  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7703  , submatrices(0)
7704  , parent(nullptr)
7705  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7706  , leaf_set(0)
7707  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7708  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7709  , bc_node(nullptr)
7710  , row_indices(nullptr)
7711  , col_indices(nullptr)
7712  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7713  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7714  , m(0)
7715  , n(0)
7716  , Tind()
7717  , Sigma_P(0)
7718  , Sigma_R(0)
7719  , Sigma_F(0)
7720 {}
7721 
7722 
7723 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7724 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7725  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct,
7726  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7727  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7728  , submatrices(0)
7729  , parent(nullptr)
7730  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7731  , leaf_set(0)
7732  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7733  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7734  , bc_node(nullptr)
7735  , row_indices(nullptr)
7736  , col_indices(nullptr)
7737  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7738  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7739  , m(0)
7740  , n(0)
7741  , Tind()
7742  , Sigma_P(0)
7743  , Sigma_R(0)
7744  , Sigma_F(0)
7745 {
7746  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bct.get_root(), fixed_rank_k);
7747  build_leaf_set();
7748 }
7749

7751 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7752 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7753  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
7754  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7755  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7756  , submatrices(0)
7757  , parent(nullptr)
7758  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7759  , leaf_set(0)
7760  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7761  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7762  , bc_node(nullptr)
7763  , row_indices(nullptr)
7764  , col_indices(nullptr)
7765  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7766  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7767  , m(0)
7768  , n(0)
7769  , Tind()
7770  , Sigma_P(0)
7771  , Sigma_R(0)
7772  , Sigma_F(0)
7773 {
7774  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
7775  build_leaf_set();
7776 }

7779 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7780 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7781  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct,
7782  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M,
7783  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7784  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7785  , submatrices(0)
7786  , parent(nullptr)
7787  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7788  , leaf_set(0)
7789  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7790  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7791  , bc_node(nullptr)
7792  , row_indices(nullptr)
7793  , col_indices(nullptr)
7794  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7795  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7796  , m(0)
7797  , n(0)
7798  , Tind()
7799  , Sigma_P(0)
7800  , Sigma_R(0)
7801  , Sigma_F(0)
7802 {
7803  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bct.get_root(), fixed_rank_k, M);
7804  build_leaf_set();
7805 }

7818  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7819  , bc_node(nullptr)
7820  , row_indices(nullptr)
7821  , col_indices(nullptr)

7823  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7824  , m(0)
7825  , n(0)
7826  , Tind()
7827  , Sigma_P(0)
7828  , Sigma_R(0)
7829  , Sigma_F(0)
7830 {
7831  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bct.get_root(), M);
7832  build_leaf_set();
7833 }

7837 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7838  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
7839  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M,
7840  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
7841  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7842  , submatrices(0)
7843  , parent(nullptr)
7844  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7845  , leaf_set(0)
7846  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7847  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7848  , bc_node(nullptr)
7849  , row_indices(nullptr)
7850  , col_indices(nullptr)
7851  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7852  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7853  , m(0)
7854  , n(0)
7855  , Tind()
7856  , Sigma_P(0)
7857  , Sigma_R(0)
7858  , Sigma_F(0)
7859 {
7860  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bc_node, fixed_rank_k, M);
7861  build_leaf_set();
7862 }

7865 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7866 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7867  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
7868  const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> & M)
7869  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7870  , submatrices(0)
7871  , parent(nullptr)
7872  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7873  , leaf_set(0)
7874  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7875  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7876  , bc_node(nullptr)
7877  , row_indices(nullptr)
7878  , col_indices(nullptr)
7879  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7880  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7881  , m(0)
7882  , n(0)
7883  , Tind()
7884  , Sigma_P(0)
7885  , Sigma_R(0)
7886  , Sigma_F(0)
7887 {
7888  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bc_node, M);
7889  build_leaf_set();
7890 }
