7892 
7893 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7894 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7895  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
7896  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> && H)
7897  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7898  , submatrices(0)
7899  , parent(nullptr)
7900  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7901  , leaf_set(0)
7902  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7903  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7904  , bc_node(nullptr)
7905  , row_indices(nullptr)
7906  , col_indices(nullptr)
7907  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7908  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7909  , m(0)
7910  , n(0)
7911  , Tind(std::move(H.Tind))
7912  , Sigma_P(0)
7913  , Sigma_R(0)
7914  , Sigma_F(0)
7915 {
7916  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bc_node, std::move(H));
7917  build_leaf_set();
7918 }
7919 
7920 
7921 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7922 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(
7923  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct,
7924  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> && H)
7925  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7926  , submatrices(0)
7927  , parent(nullptr)
7928  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7929  , leaf_set(0)
7930  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7931  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7932  , bc_node(nullptr)
7933  , row_indices(nullptr)
7934  , col_indices(nullptr)
7935  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7936  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7937  , m(0)
7938  , n(0)
7939  , Tind(std::move(H.Tind))
7940  , Sigma_P(0)
7941  , Sigma_R(0)
7942  , Sigma_F(0)
7943 {
7944  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bct.get_root(), std::move(H));
7945  build_leaf_set();
7946 }
7947 
7948 
7949 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7950 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &H)
7951  : type(UndefinedMatrixType)
7952  , submatrices(0)
7953  , parent(nullptr)
7954  , submatrix_index(submatrix_index_invalid)
7955  , leaf_set(0)
7956  , rkmatrix(nullptr)
7957  , fullmatrix(nullptr)
7958  , bc_node(nullptr)
7959  , row_indices(nullptr)
7960  , col_indices(nullptr)
7961  , row_index_global_to_local_map()
7962  , col_index_global_to_local_map()
7963  , m(0)
7964  , n(0)
7965  , Tind()
7966  , Sigma_P(0)
7967  , Sigma_R(0)
7968  , Sigma_F(0)
7969 {
7970  copy_hmatrix(*this, H);
7971  build_leaf_set();
7972 }
7973 
7974 
7975 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
7976 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::HMatrix(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &&H)
7977  : type(H.type)
7978  , submatrices(H.submatrices)
7979  , parent(H.parent)
7980  , submatrix_index(H.submatrix_index)
7981  , leaf_set(H.leaf_set)
7982  , rkmatrix(H.rkmatrix)
7983  , fullmatrix(H.fullmatrix)
7984  , bc_node(H.bc_node)
7985  , row_indices(H.row_indices)
7986  , col_indices(H.col_indices)
7987  , row_index_global_to_local_map(H.row_index_global_to_local_map)
7988  , col_index_global_to_local_map(H.col_index_global_to_local_map)
7989  , m(H.m)
7990  , n(H.n)
7991  , Tind(std::move(H.Tind))
7992  , Sigma_P(H.Sigma_P)
7993  , Sigma_R(H.Sigma_R)
7994  , Sigma_F(H.Sigma_F)
7995 {
7996  H.clear_hmat_node();
7997 }
7998 
7999 
8000 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8001 void
8002 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::reinit(const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct,
8003  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
8004 {
8005  release();
8006  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bct.get_root(), fixed_rank_k);
8007  build_leaf_set();
8008 }
8009 
8010 
8011 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8012 void
8013 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::reinit(
8014  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_const_pointer_type bc_node,
8015  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
8016 {
8017  release();
8018  InitAndCreateHMatrixChildren(this, bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
8019  build_leaf_set();
8020 }
8021 
8022 
8023 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8024 HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &
8025 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::operator=(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &&H)
8026 {
8027  release();
8028  copy_hmatrix_node((*this), std::move(H));
8029  H.clear_hmat_node();
8030 
8031  return (*this);
8032 }
8033 
8034 
8035 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8036 HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &
8037 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::operator=(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &H)
8038 {
8039  release();
8040  copy_hmatrix(*this, H);
8041  build_leaf_set();
8042 
8043  return (*this);
8044 }
8045 
8046 
8047 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8048 template <typename MatrixType>
8049 void
8050 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::convertToFullMatrix(MatrixType &M) const
8051 {
8052  M.reinit(m, n);
8053  _convertToFullMatrix(M);
8054 }
8055 
8056 
8057 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8058 template <typename MatrixType>
8059 void
8060 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_convertToFullMatrix(MatrixType &M) const
8061 {
8062  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> matrix_block;
8063 
8064  switch (type)
8065  {
8066  case FullMatrixType:
8067  Assert(fullmatrix, ExcInternalError());
8068 
8069  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
8070  {
8071  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
8072  {
8073  M(row_indices->at(i), col_indices->at(j)) = (*fullmatrix)(i, j);
8074  }
8075  }
8076 
8077  break;
8078  case RkMatrixType:
8079  Assert(rkmatrix, ExcInternalError());
8080 
8081  rkmatrix->convertToFullMatrix(matrix_block);
8082 
8083  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
8084  {
8085  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
8086  {
8087  M(row_indices->at(i), col_indices->at(j)) = matrix_block(i, j);
8088  }
8089  }
8090 
8091  break;
8092  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
8093  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8094  {
8095  submatrix->_convertToFullMatrix(M);
8096  }
8097 
8098  break;
8099  default:
8100  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8101  }
8102 }
8103 
8104 
8105 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8106 void
8107 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_build_leaf_set(
8108  std::vector<HMatrix *> &total_leaf_set) const
8109 {
8110  switch (type)
8111  {
8112  case FullMatrixType:
8113  {
8114  total_leaf_set.push_back(const_cast<HMatrix *>(this));
8115 
8116  break;
8117  }
8118  case RkMatrixType:
8119  {
8120  total_leaf_set.push_back(const_cast<HMatrix *>(this));
8121 
8122  break;
8123  }
8124  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
8125  {
8126  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8127  {
8128  submatrix->_build_leaf_set(total_leaf_set);
8129  }
8130 
8131  break;
8132  }
8133  default:
8134  {
8135  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8136 
8137  break;
8138  }
8139  }
8140 }
8141 
8142 
8143 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8144 void
8145 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::
8146  distribute_all_non_leaf_nodes_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(
8147  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
8148 {
8152  if (submatrices.size() > 0)
8153  {
8158  Assert(type == HierarchicalMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8159 
8165  distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(fixed_rank);
8166 
8172  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8173  {
8174  Assert(submatrix, ExcInternalError());
8175 
8176  submatrix->distribute_all_non_leaf_nodes_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(
8177  fixed_rank);
8178  }
8179  }
8180 }
8181 
8182 
8183 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8184 void
8185 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(
8186  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
8187 {
8188  if (Sigma_R.size() > 0 || Sigma_F.size() > 0)
8189  {
8190  if (row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
8191  {
8192  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*row_indices,
8193  row_index_global_to_local_map);
8194  }
8195 
8196  if (col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
8197  {
8198  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*col_indices,
8199  col_index_global_to_local_map);
8200  }
8201 
8202  _distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(*this, fixed_rank);
8203 
8204  for (auto &rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat : Sigma_R)
8205  {
8206  if (rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat != nullptr)
8207  {
8208  delete rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat;
8209  rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat = nullptr;
8210  }
8211  }
8212 
8213  Sigma_R.clear();
8214 
8215  for (auto &fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat : Sigma_F)
8216  {
8217  if (fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat != nullptr)
8218  {
8219  delete fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat;
8220  fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat = nullptr;
8221  }
8222  }
8223 
8224  Sigma_F.clear();
8225  }
8226 }
8227 
8228 
8229 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8230 void
8231 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(
8232  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &starting_hmat,
8233  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
8234 {
8235  if (submatrices.size() > 0)
8236  {
8237  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8238  {
8239  submatrix->_distribute_sigma_r_and_f_to_leaves(starting_hmat,
8240  fixed_rank);
8241  }
8242  }
8243  else
8244  {
8245  switch (type)
8246  {
8247  case FullMatrixType:
8248  {
8253  for (RkMatrix<Number> *rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat :
8254  starting_hmat.Sigma_R)
8255  {
8256  Assert(rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat, ExcInternalError());
8257 
8258  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> fullmatrix_restricted;
8259 
8260  rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat->restrictToFullMatrix(
8261  *row_indices,
8262  *col_indices,
8263  starting_hmat.row_index_global_to_local_map,
8264  starting_hmat.col_index_global_to_local_map,
8265  fullmatrix_restricted);
8266 
8267  fullmatrix->add(fullmatrix_restricted);
8268  }
8269 
8274  for (LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat :
8275  starting_hmat.Sigma_F)
8276  {
8277  Assert(fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat, ExcInternalError());
8278 
8279  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> fullmatrix_restricted(
8280  *row_indices,
8281  *col_indices,
8282  *fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat,
8283  starting_hmat.row_index_global_to_local_map,
8284  starting_hmat.col_index_global_to_local_map);
8285 
8286  fullmatrix->add(fullmatrix_restricted);
8287  }
8288 
8289  break;
8290  }
8291  case RkMatrixType:
8292  {
8297  for (RkMatrix<Number> *rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat :
8298  starting_hmat.Sigma_R)
8299  {
8300  Assert(rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat, ExcInternalError());
8301 
8302  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix_restricted(
8303  *row_indices,
8304  *col_indices,
8305  *rkmatrix_in_starting_hmat,
8306  starting_hmat.row_index_global_to_local_map,
8307  starting_hmat.col_index_global_to_local_map);
8308 
8309  if (fixed_rank == 0)
8310  {
8311  rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_restricted);
8312  }
8313  else
8314  {
8315  rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_restricted, fixed_rank);
8316  }
8317  }
8318 
8323  for (LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat :
8324  starting_hmat.Sigma_F)
8325  {
8326  Assert(fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat, ExcInternalError());
8327 
8328  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix_restricted(
8329  *row_indices,
8330  *col_indices,
8331  *fullmatrix_in_starting_hmat,
8332  starting_hmat.row_index_global_to_local_map,
8333  starting_hmat.col_index_global_to_local_map);
8334 
8335  if (fixed_rank == 0)
8336  {
8337  rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_restricted);
8338  }
8339  else
8340  {
8341  rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_restricted, fixed_rank);
8342  }
8343  }
8344 
8345  break;
8346  }
8347  default:
8348  {
8349  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8350  break;
8351  }
8352  }
8353  }
8354 }
8355 
8356 
8357 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8358 void
8359 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::release()
8360 {
8361  if (rkmatrix != nullptr)
8362  {
8363  delete rkmatrix;
8364  rkmatrix = nullptr;
8365  }
8366 
8367  if (fullmatrix != nullptr)
8368  {
8369  delete fullmatrix;
8370  fullmatrix = nullptr;
8371  }
8372 
8373  for (auto submatrix : submatrices)
8374  {
8381  if (submatrix != nullptr)
8382  {
8383  delete submatrix;
8384  }
8385  }
8386 
8387  submatrices.clear();
8388  leaf_set.clear();
8389 
8390  type = UndefinedMatrixType;
8391  bc_node = nullptr;
8392  parent = nullptr;
8393  submatrix_index = submatrix_index_invalid;
8394  row_indices = nullptr;
8395  col_indices = nullptr;
8396  row_index_global_to_local_map.clear();
8397  col_index_global_to_local_map.clear();
8398  m = 0;
8399  n = 0;
8400 
8401  Sigma_P.clear();
8402 
8403  for (auto &r : Sigma_R)
8404  {
8405  if (r != nullptr)
8406  {
8407  delete r;
8408  r = nullptr;
8409  }
8410  }
8411  Sigma_R.clear();
8412 
8413  for (auto &f : Sigma_F)
8414  {
8415  if (f != nullptr)
8416  {
8417  delete f;
8418  f = nullptr;
8419  }
8420  }
8421  Sigma_F.clear();
8422 
8423  Tind.release();
8424 }
8425 
8426 
8427 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8428 void
8429 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::clear()
8430 {
8434  if (submatrices.size() > 0)
8435  {
8436  Assert(type == HierarchicalMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8437 
8438  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8439  {
8440  submatrix->clear();
8441  }
8442  }
8443 
8447  clear_hmat_node();
8448 }
8449 
8450 
8451 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8452 void
8453 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::clear_hmat_node()
8454 {
8455  type = UndefinedMatrixType;
8456  submatrices.clear();
8457  parent = nullptr;
8458  submatrix_index = submatrix_index_invalid;
8459  leaf_set.clear();
8460  rkmatrix = nullptr;
8461  fullmatrix = nullptr;
8462  bc_node = nullptr;
8463  row_indices = nullptr;
8464  col_indices = nullptr;
8465  row_index_global_to_local_map.clear();
8466  col_index_global_to_local_map.clear();
8467  m = 0;
8468  n = 0;
8469  Sigma_P.clear();
8470  Sigma_R.clear();
8471  Sigma_F.clear();
8472  Tind.clear();
8473 }
8474 
8475 
8476 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8477 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::~HMatrix()
8478 {
8479  release();
8480 }
8481 
8482 
8483 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8484 HMatrixType
8485 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_type() const
8486 {
8487  return type;
8488 }
8489 
8490 
8491 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8492 typename HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::size_type
8493 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_m() const
8494 {
8495  return m;
8496 }
8497 
8498 
8499 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8500 typename HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::size_type
8501 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_n() const
8502 {
8503  return n;
8504 }
8505 
8506 
8507 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8508 RkMatrix<Number> *
8509 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_rkmatrix()
8510 {
8511  return rkmatrix;
8512 }
8513 
8514 
8515 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8516 const RkMatrix<Number> *
8517 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_rkmatrix() const
8518 {
8519  return rkmatrix;
8520 }
8521 
8522 
8523 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8524 void
8525 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::calc_rank_upper_bound_for_rkmatrices() const
8526 {
8527  switch (type)
8528  {
8529  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
8530  {
8531  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8532  {
8533  submatrix->calc_rank_upper_bound_for_rkmatrices();
8534  }
8535  }
8536 
8537  break;
8538  case RkMatrixType:
8539  {
8540  this->rkmatrix->calc_rank_upper_bound();
8541  }
8542 
8543  break;
8544  default: // Do nothing.
8545  {
8546  break;
8547  }
8548  }
8549 }
8550 
8551 
8552 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8553 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *
8554 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_fullmatrix()
8555 {
8556  return fullmatrix;
8557 }
8558 
8559 
8560 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8561 const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> *
8562 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_fullmatrix() const
8563 {
8564  return fullmatrix;
8565 }
8566 
8567 
8568 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8569 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &
8570 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_submatrices()
8571 {
8572  return submatrices;
8573 }
8574 
8575 
8576 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8577 const std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &
8578 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_submatrices() const
8579 {
8580  return submatrices;
8581 }
8582 
8583 
8584 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8585 void
8586 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::print_formatted(std::ostream & out,
8587  const unsigned int precision,
8588  const bool scientific,
8589  const unsigned int width,
8590  const char * zero_string,
8591  const double denominator,
8592  const double threshold) const
8593 {
8594  switch (type)
8595  {
8596  case FullMatrixType:
8597  fullmatrix->print_formatted(out,
8598  precision,
8599  scientific,
8600  width,
8601  zero_string,
8602  denominator,
8603  threshold);
8604 
8605  break;
8606  case RkMatrixType:
8607  rkmatrix->print_formatted(out,
8608  precision,
8609  scientific,
8610  width,
8611  zero_string,
8612  denominator,
8613  threshold);
8614 
8615  break;
8616  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
8617  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8618  {
8619  submatrix->print_formatted(out,
8620  precision,
8621  scientific,
8622  width,
8623  zero_string,
8624  denominator,
8625  threshold);
8626  }
8627 
8628  break;
8629  case UndefinedMatrixType:
8630  default:
8631  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8632  break;
8633  }
8634 }
8635 
8636 
8637 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8638 void
8639 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::print_matrix_info(std::ostream &out) const
8640 {
8641  print_current_matrix_info(out);
8642 
8643  for (const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8644  {
8645  submatrix->print_matrix_info(out);
8646  }
8647 }
8648 
8649 
8650 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8651 void
8652 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::print_current_matrix_info(std::ostream &out) const
8653 {
8654  out << "H-matrix address: " << std::hex << this << "\n";
8655  out << "Parent H-matrix address: " << std::hex << this->parent << "\n";
8656  out << "Submatrix addresses: (";
8657  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
8658  {
8659  out << std::hex << submatrices[i];
8660 
8661  if (i < submatrices.size() - 1)
8662  {
8663  out << ",";
8664  }
8665  }
8666  out << ")\n";
8667  out << "Submatrix index wrt. the parent H-matrix: " << std::dec
8668  << this->submatrix_index << std::endl;
8669 
8673  print_h_submatrix_accessor(std::cout, "M", *this);
8674  out << std::endl;
8675  out << "(#level, #Sigma_b^P, #Sigma_b^R, #Sigma_b^F)=("
8676  << bc_node->get_level() << "," << Sigma_P.size() << "," << Sigma_R.size()
8677  << "," << Sigma_F.size() << ")" << std::endl;
8678 
8679  for (std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
8680  hmat_pair : Sigma_P)
8681  {
8682  out << " Sigma_P products: ";
8683  print_h_h_submatrix_mmult_accessor(
8684  std::cout, "M1", *(hmat_pair.first), "M2", *(hmat_pair.second));
8685  }
8686 }
8687 
8688 
8689 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8690 void
8691 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::print_matrix_info_as_dot(std::ostream &out) const
8692 {
8696  out << "#@startdot\n";
8697  out << "digraph hmatrix {\n";
8698 
8702  out << "node [style=filled, shape=box]\n";
8703 
8707  out << "\"Non-leaf block\" [fillcolor=white]\n";
8708  out << "\"Near field block\" [fillcolor=red]\n";
8709  out << "\"Far field block\" [fillcolor=green]\n";
8710 
8711  _print_matrix_info_as_dot_node(out);
8712 
8716  out << "}\n";
8717  out << "#@enddot" << std::endl;
8718 }
8719 
8720 
8721 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8722 void
8723 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_print_matrix_info_as_dot_node(
8724  std::ostream &out) const
8725 {
8731  out << "\"" << std::hex << this << "\""
8732  << "[label=<<b>" << std::hex << this << "</b><br/>" << std::dec
8733  << "tau: [";
8734  print_vector_values(out, *row_indices, ",", false);
8735  out << "]<br/>sigma: [";
8736  print_vector_values(out, *col_indices, ",", false);
8737  out << "]<br/>Level: " << bc_node->get_level() << "<br/>";
8738  out << "Parent: " << std::hex << parent << "<br/>";
8739  out << "Submatrix index: " << std::dec << submatrix_index << ">,";
8740 
8741  std::string node_color;
8742 
8743  if (type == FullMatrixType)
8744  {
8745  node_color = "red";
8746  }
8747  else if (type == RkMatrixType)
8748  {
8749  node_color = "green";
8750  }
8751  else
8752  {
8753  node_color = "white";
8754  }
8755  out << "fillcolor = " << node_color << "]\n\n";
8756 
8760  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8761  {
8762  Assert(submatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
8763 
8764  out << "\"" << std::hex << this << "\""
8765  << "->"
8766  << "\"" << std::hex << submatrix << "\"\n";
8767  }
8768  out << "\n";
8769 
8773  for (HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *submatrix : submatrices)
8774  {
8775  Assert(submatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
8776 
8777  submatrix->_print_matrix_info_as_dot_node(out);
8778  }
8779 }
8780 
8781 
8782 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8783 void
8784 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::write_fullmatrix_leaf_node(
8785  std::ostream &out,
8786  const Number singular_value_threshold) const
8787 {
8788  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8789 
8790  const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &tau_index_set =
8791  bc_node->get_data_reference()
8792  .get_tau_node()
8793  ->get_data_reference()
8794  .get_index_set();
8795  const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &sigma_index_set =
8796  bc_node->get_data_reference()
8797  .get_sigma_node()
8798  ->get_data_reference()
8799  .get_index_set();
8800 
8804  out << "[";
8805  print_vector_values(out, tau_index_set, " ", false);
8806  out << "],";
8807 
8811  out << "[";
8812  print_vector_values(out, sigma_index_set, " ", false);
8813  out << "],";
8814 
8818  out << (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field() ? 1 : 0) << ",";
8819 
8824  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> copy(*fullmatrix);
8825  const size_t rank = copy.rank(singular_value_threshold);
8826 
8830  out << rank << "\n";
8831 }
8832 
8833 
8834 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8835 void
8836 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::write_rkmatrix_leaf_node(std::ostream &out) const
8837 {
8838  Assert(type == RkMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8839 
8840  const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &tau_index_set =
8841  bc_node->get_data_reference()
8842  .get_tau_node()
8843  ->get_data_reference()
8844  .get_index_set();
8845  const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &sigma_index_set =
8846  bc_node->get_data_reference()
8847  .get_sigma_node()
8848  ->get_data_reference()
8849  .get_index_set();
8850 
8854  out << "[";
8855  print_vector_values(out, tau_index_set, " ", false);
8856  out << "],";
8857 
8861  out << "[";
8862  print_vector_values(out, sigma_index_set, " ", false);
8863  out << "],";
8864 
8868  out << (bc_node->get_data_reference().get_is_near_field() ? 1 : 0) << ",";
8869 
8873  out << rkmatrix->get_rank() << "\n";
8874 
8875  // DEBUG: Print out the rkmatrix.
8876  // rkmatrix->print_formatted(out, 8, false, 16, "0");
8877 }
8878 
8879 
8880 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8881 void
8882 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::write_leaf_set(
8883  std::ostream &out,
8884  const Number singular_value_threshold) const
8885 {
8886  switch (type)
8887  {
8888  case FullMatrixType:
8889  {
8890  write_fullmatrix_leaf_node(out, singular_value_threshold);
8891 
8892  break;
8893  }
8894  case RkMatrixType:
8895  {
8896  write_rkmatrix_leaf_node(out);
8897 
8898  break;
8899  }
8900  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
8901  {
8902  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
8903  {
8904  submatrix->write_leaf_set(out);
8905  }
8906 
8907  break;
8908  }
8909  default:
8910  {
8911  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8912 
8913  break;
8914  }
8915  }
8916 }
8917 
8918 
8919 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8920 void
8921 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::write_leaf_set_by_iteration(
8922  std::ostream &out,
8923  const Number singular_value_threshold) const
8924 {
8925  for (HMatrix *leaf_node : leaf_set)
8926  {
8927  switch (leaf_node->type)
8928  {
8929  case FullMatrixType:
8930  {
8931  leaf_node->write_fullmatrix_leaf_node(out,
8932  singular_value_threshold);
8933 
8934  break;
8935  }
8936  case RkMatrixType:
8937  {
8938  leaf_node->write_rkmatrix_leaf_node(out);
8939 
8940  break;
8941  }
8942  default:
8943  {
8944  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
8945 
8946  break;
8947  }
8948  }
8949  }
8950 }
8951 
8952 
8953 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
8954 HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *
8955 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::find_row_diag_block_for_offdiag_block()
8956 {
8961  Assert(
8962  parent != nullptr,
8963  ExcMessage(
8964  "The current H-matrix node, the diagonal block of which on a same row is to be found, should not be on the top level!"));
8965 
8985  std::vector<unsigned int> submatrix_index_stack;
8986  submatrix_index_stack.reserve(this->bc_node->get_level());
8987 
8988  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *current_hmat_during_recursion = this;
8989  bool is_recursion_continued = true;
8990  while (is_recursion_continued)
8991  {
8992  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent == nullptr)
8993  {
8998  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
8999  is_recursion_continued = false;
9000  }
9001  else
9002  {
9003  switch (current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index)
9004  {
9005  case 1:
9006  {
9022  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0]
9023  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9024  .get_tau_node() ==
9025  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0]
9026  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9027  .get_sigma_node())
9028  {
9029  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9030  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0];
9031  is_recursion_continued = false;
9032  }
9033  else
9034  {
9038  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
9039  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
9040  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9041  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
9042  }
9043 
9044  break;
9045  }
9046  case 2:
9047  {
9055  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3]
9056  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9057  .get_tau_node() ==
9058  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3]
9059  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9060  .get_sigma_node())
9061  {
9062  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9063  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3];
9064  is_recursion_continued = false;
9065  }
9066  else
9067  {
9071  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
9072  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
9073  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9074  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
9075  }
9076 
9077  break;
9078  }
9079  default:
9080  {
9084  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
9085  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
9086  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9087  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
9088 
9089  break;
9090  }
9091  }
9092  }
9093  }
9094 
9095  const unsigned int iter_num = submatrix_index_stack.size();
9096  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < iter_num; i++)
9097  {
9098  switch (submatrix_index_stack.back())
9099  {
9100  case 0:
9101  case 1:
9102  {
9103  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9104  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrices[0];
9105 
9106  break;
9107  }
9108  case 2:
9109  case 3:
9110  {
9111  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9112  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrices[3];
9113 
9114  break;
9115  }
9116  }
9117 
9118  submatrix_index_stack.pop_back();
9119  }
9120 
9121  return current_hmat_during_recursion;
9122 }
9123 
9124 
9125 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9126 HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *
9127 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::find_col_diag_block_for_offdiag_block()
9128 {
9133  Assert(
9134  parent != nullptr,
9135  ExcMessage(
9136  "The current H-matrix node, the diagonal block of which on a same row is to be found, should not be on the top level!"));
9137 
9157  std::vector<unsigned int> submatrix_index_stack;
9158  submatrix_index_stack.reserve(this->bc_node->get_level());
9159 
9160  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *current_hmat_during_recursion = this;
9161  bool is_recursion_continued = true;
9162  while (is_recursion_continued)
9163  {
9164  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent == nullptr)
9165  {
9171  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
9172  is_recursion_continued = false;
9173  }
9174  else
9175  {
9176  switch (current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index)
9177  {
9178  case 1:
9179  {
9195  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3]
9196  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9197  .get_tau_node() ==
9198  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3]
9199  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9200  .get_sigma_node())
9201  {
9202  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9203  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[3];
9204  is_recursion_continued = false;
9205  }
9206  else
9207  {
9211  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
9212  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
9213  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9214  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
9215  }
9216 
9217  break;
9218  }
9219  case 2:
9220  {
9228  if (current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0]
9229  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9230  .get_tau_node() ==
9231  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0]
9232  ->bc_node->get_data_reference()
9233  .get_sigma_node())
9234  {
9235  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9236  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent->submatrices[0];
9237  is_recursion_continued = false;
9238  }
9239  else
9240  {
9244  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
9245  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
9246  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9247  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
9248  }
9249 
9250  break;
9251  }
9252  default:
9253  {
9257  submatrix_index_stack.push_back(
9258  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrix_index);
9259  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9260  current_hmat_during_recursion->parent;
9261 
9262  break;
9263  }
9264  }
9265  }
9266  }
9267 
9268  const unsigned int iter_num = submatrix_index_stack.size();
9269  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < iter_num; i++)
9270  {
9271  switch (submatrix_index_stack.back())
9272  {
9273  case 0:
9274  case 2:
9275  {
9276  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9277  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrices[0];
9278 
9279  break;
9280  }
9281  case 1:
9282  case 3:
9283  {
9284  current_hmat_during_recursion =
9285  current_hmat_during_recursion->submatrices[3];
9286 
9287  break;
9288  }
9289  }
9290 
9291  submatrix_index_stack.pop_back();
9292  }
9293 
9294  return current_hmat_during_recursion;
9295 }
9296 
9297 
9298 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9299 void
9300 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::truncate_to_rank(size_type new_rank)
9301 {
9302  switch (type)
9303  {
9304  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9305  {
9306  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9307  {
9308  submatrix->truncate_to_rank(new_rank);
9309  }
9310 
9311  break;
9312  }
9313  case FullMatrixType:
9314  {
9319  break;
9320  }
9321  case RkMatrixType:
9322  {
9326  rkmatrix->truncate_to_rank(new_rank);
9327 
9328  break;
9329  }
9330  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9331  default:
9332  {
9333  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9334  break;
9335  }
9336  }
9337 }
9338 
9339 
9340 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9341 void
9342 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::truncate_to_rank_preserve_positive_definite(
9343  size_type new_rank,
9344  const bool is_only_handle_tril)
9345 {
9346  truncate_to_rank_diag_preserve_positive_definite(new_rank,
9347  is_only_handle_tril);
9348 }
9349 
9350 
9351 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9352 void
9353 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::truncate_to_rank_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9354  size_type new_rank,
9355  const bool is_only_handle_tril)
9356 {
9361  Assert(type == HierarchicalMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9362  AssertDimension(submatrices.size(), 4);
9363 
9370  Assert(
9371  submatrices[0]->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node() ==
9372  submatrices[0]->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node(),
9373  ExcMessage(
9374  "The first submatrix of the current H-matrix node is not a diagonal block!"));
9375  Assert(
9376  submatrices[3]->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node() ==
9377  submatrices[3]->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node(),
9378  ExcMessage(
9379  "The last submatrix of the current H-matrix node is not a diagonal block!"));
9380 
9381  switch (submatrices[0]->type)
9382  {
9383  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9384  {
9385  submatrices[0]->truncate_to_rank_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9386  new_rank, is_only_handle_tril);
9387 
9388  break;
9389  }
9390  case FullMatrixType:
9391  {
9395  break;
9396  }
9397  case RkMatrixType:
9401  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9402  {
9403  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9404  break;
9405  }
9406  }
9407 
9408  switch (submatrices[3]->type)
9409  {
9410  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9411  {
9412  submatrices[3]->truncate_to_rank_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9413  new_rank, is_only_handle_tril);
9414 
9415  break;
9416  }
9417  case FullMatrixType:
9418  {
9422  break;
9423  }
9424  case RkMatrixType:
9428  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9429  {
9430  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9431  break;
9432  }
9433  }
9434 
9435  if (!is_only_handle_tril)
9436  {
9437  switch (submatrices[1]->type)
9438  {
9439  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9440  {
9441  submatrices[1]
9442  ->truncate_to_rank_off_diag_preserve_positive_definite(new_rank,
9443  false);
9444 
9445  break;
9446  }
9447  case RkMatrixType:
9448  {
9449  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<double> C, D;
9450  submatrices[1]->rkmatrix->truncate_to_rank(new_rank, D, C);
9451 
9452  // DEBUG
9453  std::cout << "||D||_2=" << D.frobenius_norm()
9454  << ",||C||_2=" << C.frobenius_norm() << std::endl;
9455 
9462  break;
9463  }
9464  case FullMatrixType:
9465  {
9469  break;
9470  }
9471  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9472  {
9473  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9474  break;
9475  }
9476  }
9477  }
9478 
9479  switch (submatrices[2]->type)
9480  {
9481  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9482  {
9483  submatrices[2]->truncate_to_rank_off_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9484  new_rank, true);
9485 
9486  break;
9487  }
9488  case RkMatrixType:
9489  {
9490  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<double> C, D;
9491  submatrices[2]->rkmatrix->truncate_to_rank(new_rank, D, C);
9492 
9497  submatrices[0]->addsym_diag(C);
9498  submatrices[3]->addsym_diag(D);
9499 
9500  // DEBUG
9501  std::cout << "||D||_2=" << D.frobenius_norm()
9502  << ",||C||_2=" << C.frobenius_norm() << std::endl;
9503 
9504  break;
9505  }
9506  case FullMatrixType:
9507  {
9511  break;
9512  }
9513  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9514  {
9515  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9516  break;
9517  }
9518  }
9519 }
9520 
9521 
9522 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9523 void
9524 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::truncate_to_rank_off_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9525  size_type new_rank,
9526  const bool is_compensate_diag_blocks)
9527 {
9532  Assert(type == HierarchicalMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9533  AssertDimension(submatrices.size(), 4);
9534 
9538  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9539  {
9540  switch (submatrix->type)
9541  {
9542  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9543  {
9544  submatrix->truncate_to_rank_off_diag_preserve_positive_definite(
9545  new_rank, is_compensate_diag_blocks);
9546 
9547  break;
9548  }
9549  case FullMatrixType:
9550  {
9554  break;
9555  }
9556  case RkMatrixType:
9557  {
9558  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<double> C, D;
9559  submatrix->rkmatrix->truncate_to_rank(new_rank, D, C);
9560 
9561  if (is_compensate_diag_blocks)
9562  {
9567  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *diag_upper_left =
9568  submatrix->find_col_diag_block_for_offdiag_block();
9569  Assert(diag_upper_left != submatrix, ExcInternalError());
9570  Assert(diag_upper_left != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
9575  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *diag_bottom_right =
9576  submatrix->find_row_diag_block_for_offdiag_block();
9577  Assert(diag_bottom_right != submatrix, ExcInternalError());
9578  Assert(diag_bottom_right != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
9579 
9584  diag_upper_left->addsym_diag(C);
9585  diag_bottom_right->addsym_diag(D);
9586 
9587  // DEBUG
9588  std::cout << "||D||_2=" << D.frobenius_norm()
9589  << ",||C||_2=" << C.frobenius_norm() << std::endl;
9590  }
9591 
9592  break;
9593  }
9594  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9595  {
9596  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9597  break;
9598  }
9599  }
9600  }
9601 }
9602 
9603 
9604 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9605 void
9606 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::vmult(Vector<Number> & y,
9607  const Vector<Number> &x) const
9608 {
9609  switch (type)
9610  {
9611  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9612  {
9613  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9614  {
9615  submatrix->vmult(y, x);
9616  }
9617 
9618  break;
9619  }
9620  case FullMatrixType:
9621  {
9622  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9623  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9624 
9628  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9629  {
9630  local_x(j) = x(col_indices->at(j));
9631  }
9632 
9633  fullmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9634 
9638  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9639  {
9640  y(row_indices->at(i)) += local_y(i);
9641  }
9642 
9643  break;
9644  }
9645  case RkMatrixType:
9646  {
9647  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9648  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9649 
9653  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9654  {
9655  local_x(j) = x(col_indices->at(j));
9656  }
9657 
9658  rkmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9659 
9663  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9664  {
9665  y(row_indices->at(i)) += local_y(i);
9666  }
9667 
9668  break;
9669  }
9670  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9671  default:
9672  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9673  }
9674 }
9675 
9676 
9677 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9678 void
9679 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::vmult(Vector<Number> & y,
9680  const Number alpha,
9681  const Vector<Number> &x) const
9682 {
9683  switch (type)
9684  {
9685  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9686  {
9687  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9688  {
9689  submatrix->vmult(y, alpha, x);
9690  }
9691 
9692  break;
9693  }
9694  case FullMatrixType:
9695  {
9696  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9697  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9698 
9702  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9703  {
9704  local_x(j) = x(col_indices->at(j));
9705  }
9706 
9707  fullmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9708 
9712  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9713  {
9714  y(row_indices->at(i)) += alpha * local_y(i);
9715  }
9716 
9717  break;
9718  }
9719  case RkMatrixType:
9720  {
9721  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9722  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9723 
9727  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9728  {
9729  local_x(j) = x(col_indices->at(j));
9730  }
9731 
9732  rkmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9733 
9737  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9738  {
9739  y(row_indices->at(i)) += alpha * local_y(i);
9740  }
9741 
9742  break;
9743  }
9744  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9745  default:
9746  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9747  }
9748 }
9749 
9750 
9751 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9752 void
9753 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::vmult(
9754  Vector<Number> & y,
9755  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &y_index_global_to_local_map,
9756  const Vector<Number> & x,
9757  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &x_index_global_to_local_map)
9758  const
9759 {
9760  switch (type)
9761  {
9762  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9763  {
9764  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9765  {
9766  submatrix->vmult(y,
9767  y_index_global_to_local_map,
9768  x,
9769  x_index_global_to_local_map);
9770  }
9771 
9772  break;
9773  }
9774  case FullMatrixType:
9775  {
9776  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9777  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9778 
9782  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9783  {
9784  local_x(j) =
9785  x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
9786  }
9787 
9788  fullmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9789 
9793  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9794  {
9795  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) +=
9796  local_y(i);
9797  }
9798 
9799  break;
9800  }
9801  case RkMatrixType:
9802  {
9803  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9804  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9805 
9809  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9810  {
9811  local_x(j) =
9812  x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
9813  }
9814 
9815  rkmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9816 
9820  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9821  {
9822  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) +=
9823  local_y(i);
9824  }
9825 
9826  break;
9827  }
9828  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9829  default:
9830  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9831  }
9832 }
9833 
9834 
9835 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9836 void
9837 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::vmult(
9838  Vector<Number> & y,
9839  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &y_index_global_to_local_map,
9840  const Number alpha,
9841  const Vector<Number> & x,
9842  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &x_index_global_to_local_map)
9843  const
9844 {
9845  switch (type)
9846  {
9847  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9848  {
9849  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9850  {
9851  submatrix->vmult(y,
9852  y_index_global_to_local_map,
9853  alpha,
9854  x,
9855  x_index_global_to_local_map);
9856  }
9857 
9858  break;
9859  }
9860  case FullMatrixType:
9861  {
9862  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9863  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9864 
9868  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9869  {
9870  local_x(j) =
9871  x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
9872  }
9873 
9874  fullmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9875 
9879  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9880  {
9881  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) +=
9882  alpha * local_y(i);
9883  }
9884 
9885  break;
9886  }
9887  case RkMatrixType:
9888  {
9889  Vector<Number> local_y(m);
9890  Vector<Number> local_x(n);
9891 
9895  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
9896  {
9897  local_x(j) =
9898  x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
9899  }
9900 
9901  rkmatrix->vmult(local_y, local_x);
9902 
9906  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
9907  {
9908  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) +=
9909  alpha * local_y(i);
9910  }
9911 
9912  break;
9913  }
9914  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9915  default:
9916  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9917  }
9918 }
9919 
9920 
9921 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9922 void
9923 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::Tvmult(Vector<Number> & y,
9924  const Vector<Number> &x) const
9925 {
9926  Vector<Number> local_y(n);
9927  Vector<Number> local_x(m);
9928 
9929  switch (type)
9930  {
9931  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9932  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9933  {
9934  submatrix->Tvmult(y, x);
9935  }
9936 
9937  break;
9938  case FullMatrixType:
9942  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9943  {
9944  local_x(j) = x(row_indices->at(j));
9945  }
9946 
9947  fullmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9948 
9952  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9953  {
9954  y(col_indices->at(i)) += local_y(i);
9955  }
9956 
9957  break;
9958  case RkMatrixType:
9962  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
9963  {
9964  local_x(j) = x(row_indices->at(j));
9965  }
9966 
9967  rkmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
9968 
9972  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
9973  {
9974  y(col_indices->at(i)) += local_y(i);
9975  }
9976 
9977  break;
9978  case UndefinedMatrixType:
9979  default:
9980  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
9981  }
9982 }
9983 
9984 
9985 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
9986 void
9987 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::Tvmult(Vector<Number> & y,
9988  const Number alpha,
9989  const Vector<Number> &x) const
9990 {
9991  Vector<Number> local_y(n);
9992  Vector<Number> local_x(m);
9993 
9994  switch (type)
9995  {
9996  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
9997  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
9998  {
9999  submatrix->Tvmult(y, alpha, x);
10000  }
10001 
10002  break;
10003  case FullMatrixType:
10007  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
10008  {
10009  local_x(j) = x(row_indices->at(j));
10010  }
10011 
10012  fullmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
10013 
10017  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
10018  {
10019  y(col_indices->at(i)) += alpha * local_y(i);
10020  }
10021 
10022  break;
10023  case RkMatrixType:
10027  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
10028  {
10029  local_x(j) = x(row_indices->at(j));
10030  }
10031 
10032  rkmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
10033 
10037  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
10038  {
10039  y(col_indices->at(i)) += alpha * local_y(i);
10040  }
10041 
10042  break;
10043  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10044  default:
10045  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10046  }
10047 }
10048 
10049 
10050 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10051 void
10052 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::Tvmult(
10053  Vector<Number> & y,
10054  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &y_index_global_to_local_map,
10055  const Vector<Number> & x,
10056  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &x_index_global_to_local_map)
10057  const
10058 {
10059  Vector<Number> local_y(n);
10060  Vector<Number> local_x(m);
10061 
10062  switch (type)
10063  {
10064  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10065  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
10066  {
10067  submatrix->Tvmult(y,
10068  y_index_global_to_local_map,
10069  x,
10070  x_index_global_to_local_map);
10071  }
10072 
10073  break;
10074  case FullMatrixType:
10078  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
10079  {
10080  local_x(j) = x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(j)));
10081  }
10082 
10083  fullmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
10084 
10088  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
10089  {
10090  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(i))) += local_y(i);
10091  }
10092 
10093  break;
10094  case RkMatrixType:
10098  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
10099  {
10100  local_x(j) = x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(j)));
10101  }
10102 
10103  rkmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
10104 
10108  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
10109  {
10110  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(i))) += local_y(i);
10111  }
10112 
10113  break;
10114  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10115  default:
10116  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10117  }
10118 }
10119 
10120 
10121 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10122 void
10123 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::Tvmult(
10124  Vector<Number> & y,
10125  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &y_index_global_to_local_map,
10126  const Number alpha,
10127  const Vector<Number> & x,
10128  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t> &x_index_global_to_local_map)
10129  const
10130 {
10131  Vector<Number> local_y(n);
10132  Vector<Number> local_x(m);
10133 
10134  switch (type)
10135  {
10136  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10137  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
10138  {
10139  submatrix->Tvmult(y,
10140  y_index_global_to_local_map,
10141  alpha,
10142  x,
10143  x_index_global_to_local_map);
10144  }
10145 
10146  break;
10147  case FullMatrixType:
10151  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
10152  {
10153  local_x(j) = x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(j)));
10154  }
10155 
10156  fullmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
10157 
10161  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
10162  {
10163  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(i))) +=
10164  alpha * local_y(i);
10165  }
10166 
10167  break;
10168  case RkMatrixType:
10172  for (size_type j = 0; j < m; j++)
10173  {
10174  local_x(j) = x(x_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(j)));
10175  }
10176 
10177  rkmatrix->Tvmult(local_y, local_x);
10178 
10182  for (size_type i = 0; i < n; i++)
10183  {
10184  y(y_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(i))) +=
10185  alpha * local_y(i);
10186  }
10187 
10188  break;
10189  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10190  default:
10191  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10192  }
10193 }
10194 
10195 
10196 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10197 void
10198 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::h_h_mmult_reduction()
10199 {
10200  std::vector<
10201  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>>
10202  Sigma_P_cannot_reduced;
10203 
10204  while (Sigma_P.size() > 0)
10205  {
10206  // Get the last element in the list.
10207  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10208  & hmat_pair = Sigma_P.back();
10209  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M1 = hmat_pair.first;
10210  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M2 = hmat_pair.second;
10211 
10216  if (M1->type == RkMatrixType)
10217  {
10218  rk_h_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(M1, M2, this);
10219  }
10220  else if (M2->type == RkMatrixType)
10221  {
10222  h_rk_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(M1, M2, this);
10223  }
10224  else if (M1->type == FullMatrixType)
10225  {
10226  f_h_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(M1, M2, this);
10227  }
10228  else if (M2->type == FullMatrixType)
10229  {
10230  h_f_mmult_for_h_h_mmult(M1, M2, this);
10231  }
10232  else if (M1->bc_node->get_split_mode() == VerticalSplitMode &&
10233  M2->bc_node->get_split_mode() == HorizontalSplitMode)
10234  {
10235  // Internal splitting
10236  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10237 
10238  Assert(M1->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10239  Assert(M2->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10240  Sigma_P.push_back(
10241  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10242  M1->submatrices[0], M2->submatrices[0]));
10243 
10244  Assert(M1->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10245  Assert(M2->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10246  Sigma_P.push_back(
10247  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10248  M1->submatrices[1], M2->submatrices[1]));
10249  }
10250  else
10251  {
10256  Sigma_P_cannot_reduced.push_back(hmat_pair);
10261  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10262  }
10263  }
10264 
10269  for (std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10270  hmat_pair : Sigma_P_cannot_reduced)
10271  {
10272  Sigma_P.push_back(hmat_pair);
10273  }
10274 }
10275 
10276 
10277 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10278 void
10279 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::h_h_mmult_horizontal_split(
10280  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bc_tree)
10281 {
10285  split_block_cluster_node(bc_node, bc_tree, HorizontalSplitMode);
10286 
10287  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat0 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10288  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat0, bc_node->get_child_pointer(0));
10293  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat0);
10294 
10295  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat1 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10296  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat1, bc_node->get_child_pointer(1));
10301  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat1);
10302 
10306  while (Sigma_P.size() > 0)
10307  {
10308  // Get the last element in the list.
10309  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10310  &hmat_pair = Sigma_P.back();
10311 
10316  if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == HorizontalSplitMode &&
10317  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == UnsplitMode)
10318  {
10319  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10320  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10321  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10322  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], hmat_pair.second));
10323 
10324  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10325  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10326  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10327  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], hmat_pair.second));
10328 
10333  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10334  }
10335  else if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode &&
10336  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
10337  HorizontalSplitMode)
10338  {
10339  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10340  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10341  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10342  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10343  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10344  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10345 
10346  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10347  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10348  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10349  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10350  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10351  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10352 
10353  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2], ExcInternalError());
10354  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10355  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10356  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2],
10357  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10358 
10359  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3], ExcInternalError());
10360  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10361  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10362  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3],
10363  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10364 
10369  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10370  }
10371  else
10372  {
10373  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
10374  }
10375  }
10376 
10381  type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
10382 }
10383 
10384 
10385 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10386 void
10387 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::h_h_mmult_vertical_split(
10388  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bc_tree)
10389 {
10393  split_block_cluster_node(bc_node, bc_tree, VerticalSplitMode);
10394 
10395  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat0 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10396  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat0, bc_node->get_child_pointer(0));
10401  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat0);
10402 
10403  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat1 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10404  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat1, bc_node->get_child_pointer(1));
10409  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat1);
10410 
10414  while (Sigma_P.size() > 0)
10415  {
10416  // Get the last element in the list.
10417  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10418  &hmat_pair = Sigma_P.back();
10419 
10424  if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == UnsplitMode &&
10425  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == VerticalSplitMode)
10426  {
10427  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10428  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10429  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10430  hmat_pair.first, hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10431 
10432  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10433  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10434  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10435  hmat_pair.first, hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10436 
10441  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10442  }
10443  else if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
10444  VerticalSplitMode &&
10445  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode)
10446  {
10447  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10448  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10449  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10450  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10451  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10452  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10453 
10454  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10455  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2], ExcInternalError());
10456  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10457  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10458  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10459  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2]));
10460 
10461  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10462  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10463  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10464  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10465  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10466 
10467  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3], ExcInternalError());
10468  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10469  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10470  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10471  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3]));
10472 
10477  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10478  }
10479  else
10480  {
10481  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
10482  }
10483  }
10484 
10489  type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
10490 }
10491 
10492 
10493 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10494 void
10495 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::h_h_mmult_cross_split(
10496  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bc_tree)
10497 {
10501  split_block_cluster_node(bc_node, bc_tree, CrossSplitMode);
10502 
10503  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat0 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10504  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat0, bc_node->get_child_pointer(0));
10509  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat0);
10510 
10511  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat1 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10512  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat1, bc_node->get_child_pointer(1));
10517  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat1);
10518 
10519  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat2 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10520  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat2, bc_node->get_child_pointer(2));
10525  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat2);
10526 
10527  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *child_hmat3 = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>();
10528  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(*child_hmat3, bc_node->get_child_pointer(3));
10533  submatrices.push_back(child_hmat3);
10534 
10538  while (Sigma_P.size() > 0)
10539  {
10540  // Get the last element in the list.
10541  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10542  &hmat_pair = Sigma_P.back();
10543 
10548  if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode &&
10549  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode)
10550  {
10556  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10557  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10558  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10559  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10560  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10561  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10562 
10563  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10564  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2], ExcInternalError());
10565  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10566  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10567  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10568  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2]));
10569 
10575  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10576  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10577  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10578  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10579  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10580 
10581  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3], ExcInternalError());
10582  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10583  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10584  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10585  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3]));
10586 
10592  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2], ExcInternalError());
10593  child_hmat2->Sigma_P.push_back(
10594  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10595  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2],
10596  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10597 
10598  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3], ExcInternalError());
10599  child_hmat2->Sigma_P.push_back(
10600  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10601  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3],
10602  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[2]));
10603 
10609  child_hmat3->Sigma_P.push_back(
10610  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10611  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[2],
10612  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10613 
10614  child_hmat3->Sigma_P.push_back(
10615  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10616  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[3],
10617  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[3]));
10618 
10623  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10624  }
10625  else if (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
10626  HorizontalSplitMode &&
10627  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == VerticalSplitMode)
10628  {
10629  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10630  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0], ExcInternalError());
10631  child_hmat0->Sigma_P.push_back(
10632  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10633  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10634  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10635 
10636  Assert(hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10637  child_hmat1->Sigma_P.push_back(
10638  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10639  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[0],
10640  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10641 
10642  Assert(hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1], ExcInternalError());
10643  child_hmat2->Sigma_P.push_back(
10644  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10645  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10646  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[0]));
10647 
10648  child_hmat3->Sigma_P.push_back(
10649  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(
10650  hmat_pair.first->submatrices[1],
10651  hmat_pair.second->submatrices[1]));
10652 
10657  Sigma_P.pop_back();
10658  }
10659  else
10660  {
10661  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
10662  }
10663  }
10664 
10669  type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
10670 }
10671 
10672 
10673 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10674 void
10675 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mmult(
10676  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & C,
10677  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & B,
10678  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct_a,
10679  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct_b,
10680  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> & bct_c,
10681  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
10682 {
10693  C.release();
10694 
10699  C.Tind = BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>(
10700  bct_a.get_root()->get_data_reference().get_tau_node(),
10701  bct_b.get_root()->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node(),
10702  bct_c.get_n_min());
10703 
10707  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
10708  initial_hmat_pair(this, &B);
10709  InitHMatrixWrtBlockClusterNode(C, C.Tind.get_root(), initial_hmat_pair);
10714  h_h_mmult_phase1_recursion(&C, C.Tind);
10715 
10721  C.Tind.build_leaf_set();
10722  C.Tind.categorize_near_and_far_field_sets();
10723  C.Tind.calc_depth_and_max_level();
10724 
10728  std::ofstream out1("Tind_after_phase1.dat");
10729  C.Tind.write_leaf_set(out1);
10730  out1.close();
10731 
10735  C.build_leaf_set();
10736 
10737  // // DEBUG
10738  // std::cout << "=== Product matrix info before phase 2 ===" << std::endl;
10739  // C.print_matrix_info(std::cout);
10740 
10741  h_h_mmult_phase2(C, bct_c, fixed_rank);
10742 
10743  // // DEBUG
10744  // std::cout << "=== Product matrix info after phase 2 ===" << std::endl;
10745  // C.print_matrix_info(std::cout);
10746 
10750  std::ofstream out2("Tind_after_phase2.dat");
10751  C.Tind.write_leaf_set(out2);
10752  out2.close();
10753 
10759 }
10760 
10761 
10762 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10763 void
10764 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mmult(
10765  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & C,
10766  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & B,
10767  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct_a,
10768  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct_b,
10769  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> & bct_c,
10770  const unsigned int fixed_rank,
10771  const bool adding)
10772 {
10773  if (adding)
10774  {
10775  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> C_prime;
10776  mmult(C_prime, B, bct_a, bct_b, bct_c, fixed_rank);
10777  C.add(C_prime, fixed_rank);
10778  }
10779  else
10780  {
10781  mmult(C, B, bct_a, bct_b, bct_c, fixed_rank);
10782  }
10783 }
10784 
10785 
10786 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10787 void
10788 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
10789  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10790  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
10791 {
10792  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(C, C, (*this), B, fixed_rank);
10793 }
10794

10796 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10797 void
10798 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mmult_level_conserving(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
10799  const Number alpha,
10800  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10801  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
10802 {
10803  h_h_mmult_level_conserving(C, C, alpha, (*this), B, fixed_rank);
10804 }

10807 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10808 void
10809 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mTmult_level_conserving(
10810  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
10811  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10812  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
10813 {
10814  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(C, C, (*this), B, fixed_rank);
