10818 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10819 void
10820 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::mTmult_level_conserving(
10821  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
10822  const Number alpha,
10823  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10824  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
10825 {
10826  h_h_mTmult_level_conserving(C, C, alpha, (*this), B, fixed_rank);
10827 }
10828 
10829 
10830 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10831 void
10832 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & C,
10833  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10834  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10835 {
10840  switch (type)
10841  {
10842  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10843  {
10847  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
10848  {
10849  submatrices[i]->add(*(C.submatrices[i]),
10850  *(B.submatrices[i]),
10851  fixed_rank_k);
10852  }
10853 
10854  break;
10855  }
10856  case FullMatrixType:
10857  {
10861  this->fullmatrix->add(*(C.fullmatrix), *(B.fullmatrix));
10862 
10863  break;
10864  }
10865  case RkMatrixType:
10866  {
10870  this->rkmatrix->add(*(C.rkmatrix), *(B.rkmatrix), fixed_rank_k);
10871 
10872  break;
10873  }
10874  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10875  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10876  break;
10877  }
10878 }
10879 
10880 
10881 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10882 void
10883 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> & C,
10884  const Number b,
10885  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10886  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10887 {
10892  switch (type)
10893  {
10894  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10895  {
10899  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
10900  {
10901  submatrices[i]->add(*(C.submatrices[i]),
10902  b,
10903  *(B.submatrices[i]),
10904  fixed_rank_k);
10905  }
10906 
10907  break;
10908  }
10909  case FullMatrixType:
10910  {
10914  this->fullmatrix->add(*(C.fullmatrix), b, *(B.fullmatrix));
10915 
10916  break;
10917  }
10918  case RkMatrixType:
10919  {
10923  this->rkmatrix->add(*(C.rkmatrix), b, *(B.rkmatrix), fixed_rank_k);
10924 
10925  break;
10926  }
10927  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10928  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10929  break;
10930  }
10931 }
10932 
10933 
10934 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10935 void
10936 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10937  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10938 {
10943  switch (type)
10944  {
10945  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10946  {
10950  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
10951  {
10952  submatrices[i]->add(*(B.submatrices[i]), fixed_rank_k);
10953  }
10954 
10955  break;
10956  }
10957  case FullMatrixType:
10958  {
10962  this->fullmatrix->add(*(B.fullmatrix));
10963 
10964  break;
10965  }
10966  case RkMatrixType:
10967  {
10971  this->rkmatrix->add(*(B.rkmatrix), fixed_rank_k);
10972 
10973  break;
10974  }
10975  case UndefinedMatrixType:
10976  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
10977  break;
10978  }
10979 }
10980 
10981 
10982 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
10983 void
10984 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const Number b,
10985  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &B,
10986  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
10987 {
10992  switch (type)
10993  {
10994  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
10995  {
10999  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
11000  {
11001  submatrices[i]->add(b, *(B.submatrices[i]), fixed_rank_k);
11002  }
11003 
11004  break;
11005  }
11006  case FullMatrixType:
11007  {
11011  this->fullmatrix->add(b, *(B.fullmatrix));
11012 
11013  break;
11014  }
11015  case RkMatrixType:
11016  {
11020  this->rkmatrix->add(b, *(B.rkmatrix), fixed_rank_k);
11021 
11022  break;
11023  }
11024  case UndefinedMatrixType:
11025  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11026  break;
11027  }
11028 }
11029 
11030 
11031 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11032 void
11033 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const RkMatrix<Number> &B,
11034  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11035  &row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11036  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11037  &col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11038  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
11039 {
11040  switch (type)
11041  {
11042  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
11043  {
11044  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
11045  {
11046  submatrices[i]->add(B,
11047  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11048  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11049  fixed_rank_k);
11050  }
11051 
11052  break;
11053  }
11054  case FullMatrixType:
11055  {
11060  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> fullmatrix_from_rk;
11061  B.restrictToFullMatrix(*(row_indices),
11062  *(col_indices),
11063  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11064  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11065  fullmatrix_from_rk);
11066  this->fullmatrix->add(fullmatrix_from_rk);
11067 
11068  break;
11069  }
11070  case RkMatrixType:
11071  {
11076  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix_by_restriction(
11077  *(row_indices),
11078  *(col_indices),
11079  B,
11080  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11081  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk);
11082 
11083  // // DEBUG
11084  // std::cout << "rkmatrix rank before addition: "
11085  // << this->rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
11086 
11087  this->rkmatrix->add(rkmatrix_by_restriction, fixed_rank_k);
11088 
11089  // // DEBUG
11090  // std::cout << "rkmatrix rank after addition: "
11091  // << this->rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
11092 
11093  break;
11094  }
11095  case UndefinedMatrixType:
11096  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11097  break;
11098  }
11099 }
11100 
11101 
11102 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11103 void
11104 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const Number b,
11105  const RkMatrix<Number> &B,
11106  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11107  &row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11108  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11109  &col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11110  const size_type fixed_rank_k) const
11111 {
11112  switch (type)
11113  {
11114  case HierarchicalMatrixType:
11115  {
11116  for (size_type i = 0; i < submatrices.size(); i++)
11117  {
11118  submatrices[i]->add(b,
11119  B,
11120  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11121  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11122  fixed_rank_k);
11123  }
11124 
11125  break;
11126  }
11127  case FullMatrixType:
11128  {
11133  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> fullmatrix_from_rk;
11134  B.restrictToFullMatrix(*(row_indices),
11135  *(col_indices),
11136  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11137  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11138  fullmatrix_from_rk);
11139  this->fullmatrix->add(b, fullmatrix_from_rk);
11140 
11141  break;
11142  }
11143  case RkMatrixType:
11144  {
11149  RkMatrix<Number> rkmatrix_by_restriction(
11150  *(row_indices),
11151  *(col_indices),
11152  B,
11153  row_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk,
11154  col_index_global_to_local_map_for_rk);
11155 
11156  // // DEBUG
11157  // std::cout << "rkmatrix rank before addition: "
11158  // << this->rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
11159 
11160  this->rkmatrix->add(b, rkmatrix_by_restriction, fixed_rank_k);
11161 
11162  // // DEBUG
11163  // std::cout << "rkmatrix rank after addition: "
11164  // << this->rkmatrix->get_rank() << std::endl;
11165 
11166  break;
11167  }
11168  case UndefinedMatrixType:
11169  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11170  break;
11171  }
11172 }
11173 
11174 
11175 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11176 void
11177 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const RkMatrix<Number> &B,
11178  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
11179 {
11180  AssertDimension(m, B.get_m());
11181  AssertDimension(n, B.get_n());
11182 
11183  if (row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11184  {
11185  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(row_indices),
11186  row_index_global_to_local_map);
11187  }
11188 
11189  if (col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11190  {
11191  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(col_indices),
11192  col_index_global_to_local_map);
11193  }
11194 
11195  this->add(B,
11196  row_index_global_to_local_map,
11197  col_index_global_to_local_map,
11198  fixed_rank_k);
11199 }
11200 
11201 
11202 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11203 void
11204 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(const Number b,
11205  const RkMatrix<Number> &B,
11206  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
11207 {
11208  AssertDimension(m, B.get_m());
11209  AssertDimension(n, B.get_n());
11210 
11211  if (row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11212  {
11213  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(row_indices),
11214  row_index_global_to_local_map);
11215  }
11216 
11217  if (col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11218  {
11219  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(*(col_indices),
11220  col_index_global_to_local_map);
11221  }
11222 
11223  this->add(b,
11224  B,
11225  row_index_global_to_local_map,
11226  col_index_global_to_local_map,
11227  fixed_rank_k);
11228 }
11229 
11230 
11231 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11232 void
11233 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::addsym_diag(const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> &E)
11234 {
11235  if (E.m() != 0 && E.n() != 0)
11236  {
11246  Assert(bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node() ==
11247  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node(),
11248  ExcMessage(
11249  "The current H-matrix node should be a diagonal block!"));
11250 
11251  if (type == FullMatrixType)
11252  {
11258  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> EEH;
11259  E.mTmult(EEH, E);
11260 
11261  this->fullmatrix->add(EEH);
11262  }
11263  else
11264  {
11269  Assert(type == HierarchicalMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11270 
11271  if (row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11272  {
11273  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11274  *(row_indices), row_index_global_to_local_map);
11275  }
11276 
11277  std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &t1_cluster =
11278  *(submatrices[0]->row_indices);
11279  std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &t2_cluster =
11280  *(submatrices[3]->row_indices);
11281 
11282  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> E1(t1_cluster.size(), E.n());
11283  LAPACKFullMatrixExt<Number> E2(t2_cluster.size(), E.n());
11284 
11288  for (size_type i = 0; i < E1.m(); i++)
11289  {
11290  E1.fill_row(i,
11291  row_index_global_to_local_map.at(t1_cluster[i]),
11292  E,
11293  std::sqrt(2.0));
11294  }
11295 
11299  for (size_type i = 0; i < E2.m(); i++)
11300  {
11301  E2.fill_row(i,
11302  row_index_global_to_local_map.at(t2_cluster[i]),
11303  E,
11304  std::sqrt(2.0));
11305  }
11306 
11307  submatrices[0]->addsym_diag(E1);
11308  submatrices[3]->addsym_diag(E2);
11309  }
11310  }
11311 }
11312 
11313 
11314 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11315 void
11316 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
11317  const RkMatrix<Number> & B,
11318  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
11319 {
11320  C = (*this);
11321  C.add(B, fixed_rank_k);
11322 }
11323 
11324 
11325 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11326 void
11327 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::add(HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &C,
11328  const Number b,
11329  const RkMatrix<Number> & B,
11330  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
11331 {
11332  C = (*this);
11333  C.add(b, B, fixed_rank_k);
11334 }
11335 
11336 
11337 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11338 void
11339 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::invert_by_gauss_elim(
11340  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M_inv,
11341  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
11342 {
11343  _invert_by_gauss_elim(M_inv, fixed_rank_k);
11344 
11348  build_leaf_set();
11349  M_inv.build_leaf_set();
11350 }
11351 
11352 
11353 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11354 void
11355 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution(
11356  Vector<Number> &b,
11357  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
11358 {
11362  AssertDimension(m, n);
11363 
11364  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
11365  {
11370  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11371  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
11372 
11373  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
11374 
11378  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
11379  {
11380  local_b(j) = b(col_indices->at(j));
11381  }
11382 
11388  fullmatrix->solve_by_forward_substitution(local_b,
11389  false,
11390  is_unit_diagonal,
11391  true);
11392 
11396  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
11397  {
11398  b(row_indices->at(i)) = local_b(i);
11399  }
11400  }
11401  else
11402  {
11406  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11407  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11408  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11409  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11410 
11411  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
11412 
11413  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
11414  {
11419  for (size_type j = 0; j < i; j++)
11420  {
11421  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(b, -1.0, b);
11422  }
11423 
11427  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11428  b, is_unit_diagonal);
11429  }
11430  }
11431 }
11432 
11433 
11434 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11435 void
11436 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution(
11437  Vector<Number> & x,
11438  const Vector<Number> &b,
11439  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
11440 {
11441  x = b;
11442  solve_by_forward_substitution(x, is_unit_diagonal);
11443 }
11444 
11445 
11446 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11447 void
11448 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution(
11449  Vector<Number> &b,
11450  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11451  & vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11452  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
11453 {
11457  AssertDimension(m, n);
11458 
11459  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
11460  {
11465  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11466  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
11467 
11468  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
11469 
11473  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
11474  {
11475  local_b(j) =
11476  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
11477  }
11478 
11484  fullmatrix->solve_by_forward_substitution(local_b,
11485  false,
11486  is_unit_diagonal,
11487  true);
11488 
11492  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
11493  {
11494  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) =
11495  local_b(i);
11496  }
11497  }
11498  else
11499  {
11503  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11504  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11505  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11506  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11507 
11508  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
11509 
11510  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
11511  {
11516  for (size_type j = 0; j < i; j++)
11517  {
11518  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(
11519  b,
11520  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11521  -1.0,
11522  b,
11523  vector_index_global_to_local_map);
11524  }
11525 
11529  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11530  b, vector_index_global_to_local_map, is_unit_diagonal);
11531  }
11532  }
11533 }
11534 
11535 
11536 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11537 void
11538 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution(
11539  Vector<Number> & x,
11540  const Vector<Number> &b,
11541  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11542  & vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11543  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
11544 {
11545  x = b;
11546  solve_by_forward_substitution(x,
11547  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11548  is_unit_diagonal);
11549 }
11550 
11551 
11552 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11553 void
11554 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11555  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &X,
11556  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &Z,
11557  const unsigned int fixed_rank,
11558  const bool is_unit_diagonal)
11559 {
11560  AssertDimension(Z.m, X.m);
11561  AssertDimension(Z.n, X.n);
11562  Assert(
11563  Z.type == X.type,
11564  ExcMessage(
11565  "Matrix Z and X should be built a same block cluster and thus have a same H-matrix type!"));
11566  AssertDimension(this->m, this->n);
11567  AssertDimension(this->n, X.m);
11568 
11569  if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
11570  {
11571  if (this->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11572  {
11573  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11574  *(this->col_indices), this->col_index_global_to_local_map);
11575  }
11576 
11581  Vector<Number> X_col(X.m);
11582  Vector<Number> Z_col(Z.m);
11583 
11587  for (size_type j = 0; j < Z.n; j++)
11588  {
11589  Z.fullmatrix->get_column(j, Z_col);
11590 
11596  this->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11597  X_col,
11598  Z_col,
11599  this->col_index_global_to_local_map,
11600  is_unit_diagonal);
11601 
11606  X.fullmatrix->fill_col(j, X_col);
11607  }
11608  }
11609  else if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
11610  {
11611  if (this->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11612  {
11613  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11614  *(this->col_indices), this->col_index_global_to_local_map);
11615  }
11616 
11634  (*X.rkmatrix) = (*Z.rkmatrix);
11635 
11636  Vector<Number> A_prime_col(X.m);
11637  for (size_type j = 0; j < Z.rkmatrix->get_formal_rank(); j++)
11638  {
11639  Z.rkmatrix->get_A().get_column(j, A_prime_col);
11640 
11641  this->solve_by_forward_substitution(
11642  A_prime_col, this->col_index_global_to_local_map, is_unit_diagonal);
11643 
11647  X.rkmatrix->get_A().fill_col(j, A_prime_col);
11648  }
11649  }
11650  else
11651  {
11662  AssertDimension(
11663  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
11664  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
11665 
11671  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11672  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11673  AssertDimension(
11674  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
11675  n_row_blocks);
11680  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11681  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11682 
11687  AssertDimension(
11688  n_row_blocks,
11689  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num());
11690  AssertDimension(
11691  n_col_blocks,
11692  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
11693 
11697  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
11698  {
11704  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
11705  {
11710  for (size_type k = 0; k < i; k++)
11711  {
11712  this->submatrices[i * n_row_blocks + k]
11713  ->mmult_level_conserving(
11714  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11715  -1.0,
11716  *(X.submatrices[k * n_col_blocks + j]),
11717  fixed_rank);
11718  }
11719 
11724  this->submatrices[i * n_row_blocks + i]
11725  ->solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11726  *(X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11727  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
11728  fixed_rank,
11729  is_unit_diagonal);
11730  }
11731  }
11732  }
11733 }
11734 
11735 
11736 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11737 void
11738 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11739  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &X,
11740  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &Z,
11741  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
11742 {
11743  solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(X, Z, fixed_rank, false);
11744 }
11745 
11746 
11747 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11748 void
11749 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11750  Vector<Number> &b) const
11751 {
11755  AssertDimension(m, n);
11756 
11757  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
11758  {
11764  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11765  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
11766 
11767  Vector<Number> local_b(m);
11768 
11772  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
11773  {
11774  local_b(i) = b(row_indices->at(i));
11775  }
11776 
11781  fullmatrix->solve_by_forward_substitution(local_b, true, false, false);
11782 
11786  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
11787  {
11788  b(col_indices->at(j)) = local_b(j);
11789  }
11790  }
11791  else
11792  {
11796  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11797  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11798  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11799  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11800 
11801  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
11802 
11806  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
11807  {
11812  for (size_type i = 0; i < j; i++)
11813  {
11814  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->Tvmult(b, -1.0, b);
11815  }
11816 
11820  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
11821  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(b);
11822  }
11823  }
11824 }
11825 
11826 
11827 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11828 void
11829 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11830  Vector<Number> & x,
11831  const Vector<Number> &b) const
11832 {
11833  x = b;
11834  solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(x);
11835 }
11836 
11837 
11838 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11839 void
11840 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11841  Vector<Number> &b,
11842  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11843  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
11844 {
11848  AssertDimension(m, n);
11849 
11850  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
11851  {
11857  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
11858  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
11859 
11860  Vector<Number> local_b(m);
11861 
11865  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
11866  {
11867  local_b(i) =
11868  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i)));
11869  }
11870 
11875  fullmatrix->solve_by_forward_substitution(local_b, true, false, false);
11876 
11880  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
11881  {
11882  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j))) =
11883  local_b(j);
11884  }
11885  }
11886  else
11887  {
11891  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
11892  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
11893  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
11894  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
11895 
11896  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
11897 
11901  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
11902  {
11907  for (size_type i = 0; i < j; i++)
11908  {
11909  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->Tvmult(
11910  b,
11911  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
11912  -1.0,
11913  b,
11914  vector_index_global_to_local_map);
11915  }
11916 
11920  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
11921  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11922  b, vector_index_global_to_local_map);
11923  }
11924  }
11925 }
11926 
11927 
11928 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11929 void
11930 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11931  Vector<Number> & x,
11932  const Vector<Number> &b,
11933  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
11934  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
11935 {
11936  x = b;
11937  solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(x, vector_index_global_to_local_map);
11938 }
11939 
11940 
11941 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
11942 void
11943 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::
11944  solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
11945  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &X,
11946  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &Z,
11947  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
11948 {
11949  AssertDimension(Z.m, X.m);
11950  AssertDimension(Z.n, X.n);
11951  Assert(
11952  Z.type == X.type,
11953  ExcMessage(
11954  "Matrix Z and X should be built a same block cluster and thus have a same H-matrix type!"));
11955  AssertDimension(this->m, this->n);
11956  AssertDimension(X.n, this->m);
11957 
11958  if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
11959  {
11960  if (this->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11961  {
11962  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
11963  *(this->row_indices), this->row_index_global_to_local_map);
11964  }
11965 
11970  Vector<Number> X_row(X.n);
11971  Vector<Number> Z_row(Z.n);
11972 
11976  for (size_type i = 0; i < Z.m; i++)
11977  {
11978  Z.fullmatrix->get_row(i, Z_row);
11979 
11985  this->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
11986  X_row, Z_row, this->row_index_global_to_local_map);
11987 
11992  X.fullmatrix->fill_row(i, X_row);
11993  }
11994  }
11995  else if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
11996  {
11997  if (this->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
11998  {
11999  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
12000  *(this->row_indices), this->row_index_global_to_local_map);
12001  }
12002 
12003  (*X.rkmatrix) = (*Z.rkmatrix);
12004 
12005  Vector<Number> B_prime_col(X.n);
12006  for (size_type j = 0; j < Z.rkmatrix->get_formal_rank(); j++)
12007  {
12008  Z.rkmatrix->get_B().get_column(j, B_prime_col);
12009 
12014  this->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution(
12015  B_prime_col, this->row_index_global_to_local_map);
12016 
12020  X.rkmatrix->get_B().fill_col(j, B_prime_col);
12021  }
12022  }
12023  else
12024  {
12035  AssertDimension(
12036  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
12037  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
12038 
12043  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12044  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12050  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12051  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12052  AssertDimension(
12053  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
12054  n_col_blocks);
12055 
12060  AssertDimension(
12061  n_row_blocks,
12062  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num());
12063  AssertDimension(
12064  n_col_blocks,
12065  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
12066 
12070  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12071  {
12077  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12078  {
12083  for (size_type k = 0; k < j; k++)
12084  {
12085  X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mmult_level_conserving(
12086  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
12087  -1.0,
12088  *(this->submatrices[k * n_col_blocks + j]),
12089  fixed_rank);
12090  }
12091 
12096  this->submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
12097  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
12098  *(X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
12099  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
12100  fixed_rank);
12101  }
12102  }
12103  }
12104 }
12105 
12106 
12107 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12108 void
12109 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::
12110  solve_cholesky_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
12111  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &X,
12112  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &Z,
12113  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
12114 {
12115  AssertDimension(Z.m, X.m);
12116  AssertDimension(Z.n, X.n);
12117  Assert(
12118  Z.type == X.type,
12119  ExcMessage(
12120  "Matrix Z and X should be built a same block cluster and thus have a same H-matrix type!"));
12121  AssertDimension(this->m, this->n);
12127  AssertDimension(X.n, this->n);
12128 
12129  if (Z.type == FullMatrixType)
12130  {
12131  if (this->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
12132  {
12133  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
12134  *(this->col_indices), this->col_index_global_to_local_map);
12135  }
12136 
12141  Vector<Number> X_row(X.n);
12142  Vector<Number> Z_row(Z.n);
12143 
12147  for (size_type i = 0; i < Z.m; i++)
12148  {
12149  Z.fullmatrix->get_row(i, Z_row);
12150 
12157  this->solve_by_forward_substitution(
12158  X_row, Z_row, this->col_index_global_to_local_map, false);
12159 
12164  X.fullmatrix->fill_row(i, X_row);
12165  }
12166  }
12167  else if (Z.type == RkMatrixType)
12168  {
12169  if (this->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
12170  {
12171  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
12172  *(this->col_indices), this->col_index_global_to_local_map);
12173  }
12174 
12175  (*X.rkmatrix) = (*Z.rkmatrix);
12176 
12177  Vector<Number> B_prime_col(X.n);
12178  for (size_type j = 0; j < Z.rkmatrix->get_formal_rank(); j++)
12179  {
12180  Z.rkmatrix->get_B().get_column(j, B_prime_col);
12181 
12187  this->solve_by_forward_substitution(
12188  B_prime_col, this->col_index_global_to_local_map, false);
12189 
12193  X.rkmatrix->get_B().fill_col(j, B_prime_col);
12194  }
12195  }
12196  else
12197  {
12208  AssertDimension(
12209  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
12210  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
12211 
12216  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12217  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12223  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12224  X.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12225  AssertDimension(
12226  this->bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num(),
12227  n_col_blocks);
12228 
12233  AssertDimension(
12234  n_row_blocks,
12235  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num());
12236  AssertDimension(
12237  n_col_blocks,
12238  Z.bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
12239 
12243  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12244  {
12250  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12251  {
12256  for (size_type k = 0; k < j; k++)
12257  {
12258  X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mTmult_level_conserving(
12259  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
12260  -1.0,
12261  *(this->submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + k]),
12262  fixed_rank);
12263  }
12264 
12269  this->submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
12270  ->solve_cholesky_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
12271  *(X.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
12272  *(Z.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]),
12273  fixed_rank);
12274  }
12275  }
12276  }
12277 }
12278 
12279 
12280 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12281 void
12282 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_block_triangular_by_forward_substitution(
12283  Vector<Number> &b,
12284  const bool is_unit_block_diagonal) const
12285 {
12289  AssertDimension(m, n);
12290 
12291  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12292  {
12297  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12298  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12299 
12300  if (is_unit_block_diagonal)
12301  {
12307  }
12308  else
12309  {
12315  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
12316 
12321  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12322  {
12323  local_b(j) = b(col_indices->at(j));
12324  }
12325 
12329  fullmatrix->compute_lu_factorization();
12330  fullmatrix->solve(local_b);
12331 
12336  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12337  {
12338  b(row_indices->at(i)) = local_b(i);
12339  }
12340  }
12341  }
12342  else
12343  {
12347  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12348  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12349  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12350  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12351 
12352  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12353 
12354  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12355  {
12360  for (size_type j = 0; j < i; j++)
12361  {
12362  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(b, -1.0, b);
12363  }
12364 
12368  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]
12369  ->solve_block_triangular_by_forward_substitution(
12370  b, is_unit_block_diagonal);
12371  }
12372  }
12373 }
12374 
12375 
12376 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12377 void
12378 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_block_triangular_by_forward_substitution(
12379  Vector<Number> & x,
12380  const Vector<Number> &b,
12381  const bool is_unit_block_diagonal) const
12382 {
12383  x = b;
12384  solve_block_triangular_by_forward_substitution(x, is_unit_block_diagonal);
12385 }
12386 
12387 
12388 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12389 void
12390 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(
12391  Vector<Number> &b) const
12392 {
12393  solve_by_forward_substitution(b, false);
12394 }
12395 
12396 
12397 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12398 void
12399 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(
12400  Vector<Number> & x,
12401  const Vector<Number> &b) const
12402 {
12403  solve_by_forward_substitution(x, b, false);
12404 }
12405 
12406 
12407 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12408 void
12409 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(
12410  Vector<Number> &b,
12411  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12412  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
12413 {
12414  solve_by_forward_substitution(b, vector_index_global_to_local_map, false);
12415 }
12416 
12417 
12418 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12419 void
12420 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(
12421  Vector<Number> & x,
12422  const Vector<Number> &b,
12423  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12424  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
12425 {
12426  solve_by_forward_substitution(x, b, vector_index_global_to_local_map, false);
12427 }
12428 
12429 
12430 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12431 void
12432 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_backward_substitution(
12433  Vector<Number> &b,
12434  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
12435 {
12439  AssertDimension(m, n);
12440 
12441  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12442  {
12447  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12448  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12449 
12450  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
12451 
12455  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12456  {
12457  local_b(j) = b(col_indices->at(j));
12458  }
12459 
12463  fullmatrix->solve_by_backward_substitution(local_b,
12464  false,
12465  is_unit_diagonal);
12466 
12470  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12471  {
12472  b(row_indices->at(i)) = local_b(i);
12473  }
12474  }
12475  else
12476  {
12480  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12481  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12482  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12483  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12484 
12485  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12486 
12487  for (int i = n_row_blocks - 1; i >= 0; i--)
12488  {
12493  for (size_type j = i + 1; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12494  {
12495  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(b, -1.0, b);
12496  }
12497 
12501  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]->solve_by_backward_substitution(
12502  b, is_unit_diagonal);
12503  }
12504  }
12505 }
12506 
12507 
12508 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12509 void
12510 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_backward_substitution(
12511  Vector<Number> & x,
12512  const Vector<Number> &b,
12513  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
12514 {
12515  x = b;
12516  solve_by_backward_substitution(x, is_unit_diagonal);
12517 }
12518 
12519 
12520 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12521 void
12522 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_backward_substitution(
12523  Vector<Number> &b,
12524  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12525  & vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12526  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
12527 {
12531  AssertDimension(m, n);
12532 
12533  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12534  {
12539  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12540  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12541 
12542  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
12543 
12547  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12548  {
12549  local_b(j) =
12550  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j)));
12551  }
12552 
12556  fullmatrix->solve_by_backward_substitution(local_b,
12557  false,
12558  is_unit_diagonal);
12559 
12563  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12564  {
12565  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i))) =
12566  local_b(i);
12567  }
12568  }
12569  else
12570  {
12574  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12575  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12576  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12577  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12578 
12579  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12580 
12581  for (int i = n_row_blocks - 1; i >= 0; i--)
12582  {
12587  for (size_type j = i + 1; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12588  {
12589  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(
12590  b,
12591  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12592  -1.0,
12593  b,
12594  vector_index_global_to_local_map);
12595  }
12596 
12600  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]->solve_by_backward_substitution(
12601  b, vector_index_global_to_local_map, is_unit_diagonal);
12602  }
12603  }
12604 }
12605 
12606 
12607 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12608 void
12609 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_by_backward_substitution(
12610  Vector<Number> & x,
12611  const Vector<Number> &b,
12612  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12613  & vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12614  const bool is_unit_diagonal) const
12615 {
12616  x = b;
12617  solve_by_backward_substitution(x,
12618  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12619  is_unit_diagonal);
12620 }
12621 
12622 
12623 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12624 void
12625 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_block_triangular_by_backward_substitution(
12626  Vector<Number> &b,
12627  const bool is_unit_block_diagonal) const
12628 {
12632  AssertDimension(m, n);
12633 
12634  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12635  {
12640  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12641  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12642 
12643  if (is_unit_block_diagonal)
12644  {
12650  }
12651  else
12652  {
12658  Vector<Number> local_b(n);
12659 
12664  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12665  {
12666  local_b(j) = b(col_indices->at(j));
12667  }
12668 
12672  fullmatrix->compute_lu_factorization();
12673  fullmatrix->solve(local_b);
12674 
12679  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12680  {
12681  b(row_indices->at(i)) = local_b(i);
12682  }
12683  }
12684  }
12685  else
12686  {
12690  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12691  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12692  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12693  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12694 
12695  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12696 
12697  for (int i = n_row_blocks - 1; i >= 0; i--)
12698  {
12703  for (size_type j = i + 1; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12704  {
12705  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->vmult(b, -1.0, b);
12706  }
12707 
12711  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]
12712  ->solve_block_triangular_by_backward_substitution(
12713  b, is_unit_block_diagonal);
12714  }
12715  }
12716 }
12717 
12718 
12719 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12720 void
12721 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_block_triangular_by_backward_substitution(
12722  Vector<Number> & x,
12723  const Vector<Number> &b,
12724  const bool is_unit_block_diagonal) const
12725 {
12726  x = b;
12727  solve_block_triangular_by_backward_substitution(x, is_unit_block_diagonal);
12728 }
12729 
12730 
12731 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12732 void
12733 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12734  Vector<Number> &b) const
12735 {
12739  AssertDimension(m, n);
12740 
12741  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12742  {
12747  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12748  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12749 
12750  Vector<Number> local_b(m);
12751 
12757  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12758  {
12759  local_b(i) = b(row_indices->at(i));
12760  }
12761 
12766  fullmatrix->solve_by_backward_substitution(local_b, true, false);
12767 
12771  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12772  {
12773  b(col_indices->at(j)) = local_b(j);
12774  }
12775  }
12776  else
12777  {
12778  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12779  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12780  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12781  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12782 
12783  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12784 
12788  for (int j = n_col_blocks - 1; j >= 0; j--)
12789  {
12794  for (size_type i = j + 1; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12795  {
12800  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->Tvmult(b, -1.0, b);
12801  }
12802 
12806  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
12807  ->solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(b);
12808  }
12809  }
12810 }
12811 
12812 
12813 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12814 void
12815 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12816  Vector<Number> & x,
12817  const Vector<Number> &b) const
12818 {
12819  x = b;
12820  solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(x);
12821 }
12822 
12823 
12824 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12825 void
12826 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12827  Vector<Number> &b,
12828  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12829  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
12830 {
12834  AssertDimension(m, n);
12835 
12836  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12837  {
12842  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12843  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12844 
12845  Vector<Number> local_b(m);
12846 
12852  for (size_type i = 0; i < m; i++)
12853  {
12854  local_b(i) =
12855  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(row_indices->at(i)));
12856  }
12857 
12862  fullmatrix->solve_by_backward_substitution(local_b, true, false);
12863 
12867  for (size_type j = 0; j < n; j++)
12868  {
12869  b(vector_index_global_to_local_map.at(col_indices->at(j))) =
12870  local_b(j);
12871  }
12872  }
12873  else
12874  {
12875  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12876  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12877  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12878  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12879 
12880  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12881 
12885  for (int j = n_col_blocks - 1; j >= 0; j--)
12886  {
12891  for (size_type i = j + 1; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12892  {
12897  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]->Tvmult(
12898  b,
12899  vector_index_global_to_local_map,
12900  -1.0,
12901  b,
12902  vector_index_global_to_local_map);
12903  }
12904 
12908  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
12909  ->solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12910  b, vector_index_global_to_local_map);
12911  }
12912  }
12913 }
12914 
12915 
12916 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12917 void
12918 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(
12919  Vector<Number> & x,
12920  const Vector<Number> &b,
12921  const std::map<types::global_dof_index, size_t>
12922  &vector_index_global_to_local_map) const
12923 {
12924  x = b;
12925  solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(x, vector_index_global_to_local_map);
12926 }
12927 
12928 
12929 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
12930 void
12931 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::compute_lu_factorization(
12932  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &LU,
12933  const unsigned int fixed_rank) const
12934 {
12935  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
12936  {
12945  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
12946  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12947  Assert(LU.fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
12948 
12952  *(LU.fullmatrix) = *fullmatrix;
12953 
12958  LU.fullmatrix->compute_lu_factorization();
12959  }
12960  else
12961  {
12962  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
12963  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
12964  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
12965  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
12966 
12971  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
12972 
12977  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
12978  {
12982  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
12983  {
12990  const size_type min_ij = std::min(i, j);
12994  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(*(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]));
12995  for (size_type k = 0; k < min_ij; k++)
12996  {
12997  LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mmult_level_conserving(
12998  Z,
12999  -1.0,
13000  *(LU.submatrices[k * n_col_blocks + j]),
13001  fixed_rank);
13002  }
13003 
13004  if (j < i)
13005  {
13012  LU.submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
13013  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
13014  *(LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
13015  }
13016  else if (j == i)
13017  {
13022  Z.compute_lu_factorization(
13023  *(LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]), fixed_rank);
13024  }
13025  else if (j > i)
13026  {
13030  LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]
13031  ->solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
13032  *(LU.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
13033  }
13034  }
13035  }
13036  }
13037 }
13038 
13039 
13040 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13041 void
13042 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::compute_lu_factorization(
13043  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
13044 {
13045  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
13046  {
13055  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
13056  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
13057 
13062  fullmatrix->compute_lu_factorization();
13063  }
13064  else
13065  {
13066  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
13067  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
13068  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
13069  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
13070 
13075  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
13076 
13081  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
13082  {
13086  for (size_type j = 0; j < n_col_blocks; j++)
13087  {
13094  const size_type min_ij = std::min(i, j);
13098  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(*(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]));
13099  for (size_type k = 0; k < min_ij; k++)
13100  {
13101  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mmult_level_conserving(
13102  Z, -1.0, *(submatrices[k * n_col_blocks + j]), fixed_rank);
13103  }
13104 
13105  if (j < i)
13106  {
13113  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
13114  ->solve_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
13115  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
13116  }
13117  else if (j == i)
13118  {
13123  Z.compute_lu_factorization(
13124  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]), fixed_rank);
13125  }
13126  else if (j > i)
13127  {
13131  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]
13132  ->solve_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
13133  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
13134  }
13135  }
13136  }
13137  }
13138 }
13139 
13140 
13141 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13142 void
13143 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::compute_cholesky_factorization(
13144  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &L,
13145  const unsigned int fixed_rank) const
13146 {
13147  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
13148  {
13157  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
13158  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
13159  Assert(L.fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
13160 
13164  *(L.fullmatrix) = *fullmatrix;
13165 
13170  L.fullmatrix->compute_cholesky_factorization();
13171  }
13172  else
13173  {
13174  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
13175  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
13176  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
13177  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
13178 
13183  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
13184 
13189  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
13190  {
13195  for (size_type j = 0; j <= i; j++)
13196  {
13200  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(*(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]));
13201 
13205  for (size_type k = 0; k < j; k++)
13206  {
13207  L.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mTmult_level_conserving(
13208  Z,
13209  -1.0,
13210  *(L.submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + k]),
13211  fixed_rank);
13212  }
13213 
13214  if (j < i)
13215  {
13221  L.submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
13222  ->solve_cholesky_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
13223  *(L.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
13224  }
13225  else if (j == i)
13226  {
13231  Z.compute_cholesky_factorization(
13232  *(L.submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]), fixed_rank);
13233  }
13234  else
13235  {
13236  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
13237  }
13238  }
13239  }
13240  }
13241 }
13242 
13243 
13244 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13245 void
13246 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::compute_cholesky_factorization(
13247  const unsigned int fixed_rank)
13248 {
13249  if (type != HierarchicalMatrixType)
13250  {
13259  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
13260  Assert(fullmatrix != nullptr, ExcInternalError());
13261 
13266  fullmatrix->compute_cholesky_factorization();
13267  }
13268  else
13269  {
13270  const unsigned int n_row_blocks =
13271  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num();
13272  const unsigned int n_col_blocks =
13273  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
13274 
13279  AssertDimension(n_row_blocks, n_col_blocks);
13280 
13285  for (size_type i = 0; i < n_row_blocks; i++)
13286  {
13291  for (size_type j = 0; j <= i; j++)
13292  {
13296  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> Z(*(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]));
13297 
13301  for (size_type k = 0; k < j; k++)
13302  {
13303  submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + k]->mTmult_level_conserving(
13304  Z, -1.0, *(submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + k]), fixed_rank);
13305  }
13306 
13307  if (j < i)
13308  {
13314  submatrices[j * n_col_blocks + j]
13315  ->solve_cholesky_transpose_by_forward_substitution_matrix_valued(
13316  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + j]), Z, fixed_rank);
13317  }
13318  else if (j == i)
13319  {
13324  Z.compute_cholesky_factorization(
13325  *(submatrices[i * n_col_blocks + i]), fixed_rank);
13326  }
13327  else
13328  {
13329  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
13330  }
13331  }
13332  }
13333  }
13334 }
13335 
13336 
13337 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13338 void
13339 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_lu(Vector<Number> & x,
13340  const Vector<Number> &b) const
13341 {
13342  x = b;
13343  solve_by_forward_substitution(x, true);
13344  solve_by_backward_substitution(x, false);
13345 }
13346 
13347 
13348 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13349 void
13350 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::solve_cholesky(Vector<Number> & x,
13351  const Vector<Number> &b) const
13352 {
13353  x = b;
13354  solve_cholesky_by_forward_substitution(x);
13355  solve_cholesky_by_backward_substitution(x);
13356 }
13357 
13358 
13359 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13360 void
13361 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::_invert_by_gauss_elim(
13362  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> &M_inv,
13363  const size_type fixed_rank_k)
13364 {
13365  AssertDimension(m, n);
13366 
13378  if (*(bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()) ==
13379  *(bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()) &&
13380  bc_node->is_leaf())
13381  {
13382  Assert(type == FullMatrixType, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(type));
13383 
13384  this->fullmatrix->invert_by_gauss_elim(*(M_inv.fullmatrix));
13385  }
13386  else
13387  {
13388  AssertDimension(
13389  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_tau_node()->get_child_num(),
13390  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num());
13391 
13396  const size_type k =
13397  bc_node->get_data_reference().get_sigma_node()->get_child_num();
13398 
13402  for (size_type l = 0; l < k; l++)
13403  {
13428  const size_type diag_block_index_in_submatrices = l + l * k;
13429  submatrices[diag_block_index_in_submatrices]->_invert_by_gauss_elim(
13430  *(M_inv.submatrices[diag_block_index_in_submatrices]),
13431  fixed_rank_k);
13432 
13441  for (size_type j = l + 1; j < k; j++)
13442  {
13443  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C =
13444  new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(submatrices[j + l * k]->bc_node,
13445  fixed_rank_k);
13446  M_inv.submatrices[diag_block_index_in_submatrices]
13447  ->mmult_level_conserving(*C,
13448  *(submatrices[j + l * k]),
13449  fixed_rank_k);
13450 
13454  *(submatrices[j + l * k]) = std::move(*C);
13455 
13456  delete C;
13457  }
13458 
13464  for (size_type j = 0; j < l; j++)
13465  {
13466  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(
13467  M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]->bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
13468  M_inv.submatrices[diag_block_index_in_submatrices]
13469  ->mmult_level_conserving(*C,
13470  *(M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]),
13471  fixed_rank_k);
13472 
13476  *(M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]) = std::move(*C);
13477 
13478  delete C;
13479  }
13480 
13485  for (size_type i = l + 1; i < k; i++)
13486  {
13487  for (size_type j = 0; j <= l; j++)
13488  {
13489  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(
13490  M_inv.submatrices[j + i * k]->bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
13491  submatrices[l + i * k]->mmult_level_conserving(
13492  *C, *(M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]), fixed_rank_k);
13493  M_inv.submatrices[j + i * k]->add(-1.0, *C, fixed_rank_k);
13494 
13495  delete C;
13496  }
13497 
13498  for (size_type j = l + 1; j < k; j++)
13499  {
13500  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(
13501  submatrices[j + i * k]->bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
13502  submatrices[l + i * k]->mmult_level_conserving(
13503  *C, *(submatrices[j + l * k]), fixed_rank_k);
13504  submatrices[j + i * k]->add(-1.0, *C, fixed_rank_k);
13505 
13506  delete C;
13507  }
13508  }
13509  }
13510 
13514  for (size_type l = k - 1; l > 0; l--)
13515  {
13519  size_type i = l - 1;
13520  while (true)
13521  {
13522  for (size_type j = 0; j < k; j++)
13523  {
13524  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *C = new HMatrix<spacedim, Number>(
13525  M_inv.submatrices[j + i * k]->bc_node, fixed_rank_k);
13526  submatrices[l + i * k]->mmult_level_conserving(
13527  *C, *(M_inv.submatrices[j + l * k]), fixed_rank_k);
13528  M_inv.submatrices[j + i * k]->add(-1.0, *C, fixed_rank_k);
13529 
13530  delete C;
13531  }
13532 
13533  if (i == 0)
13534  {
13535  break;
13536  }
13537  else
13538  {
13539  i--;
13540  }
13541  }
13542  }
13543  }
13544 }
13545 
13546 
13547 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13548 void
13549 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::coarsen_to_subtree(
13550  const BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &subtree,
13551  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
13552 {
13553  coarsen_to_partition(subtree.get_leaf_set(), fixed_rank_k);
13554  build_leaf_set();
13555 }
13556 
13557 
13558 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13559 void
13560 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::coarsen_to_partition(
13561  const std::vector<
13562  typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type> &partition,
13563  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k)
13564 {
13572  if (find_pointer_data(partition.begin(), partition.end(), this->bc_node) !=
13573  partition.end())
13574  {
13580  convertHMatBlockToRkMatrix(this, fixed_rank_k);
13581  }
13582  else
13583  {
13589  for (HMatrix *submatrix : submatrices)
13590  {
13591  submatrix->coarsen_to_partition(partition, fixed_rank_k);
13592  }
13593  }
13594 }
13595 
13596 
13597 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13598 void
13599 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::build_leaf_set()
13600 {
13601  leaf_set.clear();
13602  _build_leaf_set(leaf_set);
13603 }
13604 
13605 
13606 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13607 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &
13608 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_leaf_set()
13609 {
13610  return leaf_set;
13611 }
13612 
13613 
13614 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13615 const std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &
13616 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::get_leaf_set() const
13617 {
13618  return leaf_set;
13619 }
13620 
13621 
13622 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13623 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>::iterator
13624 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::find_block_cluster_in_leaf_set(
13625  const BlockCluster<spacedim, Number> &block_cluster)
13626 {
13627  typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>::iterator iter;
13628  for (iter = leaf_set.begin(); iter != leaf_set.end(); iter++)
13629  {
13642  if ((*iter)->bc_node != nullptr)
13643  {
13644  if ((*iter)->bc_node->get_data_reference() == block_cluster)
13645  {
13646  break;
13647  }
13648  }
13649  }
13650 
13651  return iter;
13652 }
13653 
13654 
13655 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13656 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>::const_iterator
13657 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::find_block_cluster_in_leaf_set(
13658  const BlockCluster<spacedim, Number> &block_cluster) const
13659 {
13660  for (typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>::const_iterator iter =
13661  leaf_set.cbegin();
13662  iter != leaf_set.cend();
13663  iter++)
13664  {
13677  if ((*iter)->bc_node != nullptr)
13678  {
13679  if ((*iter)->bc_node->get_data_reference() == block_cluster)
13680  {
13681  return iter;
13682  }
13683  }
13684  }
13685 }
13686 
13687 
13688 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13689 void
13690 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::refine_to_supertree()
13691 {
13701  for (HMatrix *hmat_leaf_node : leaf_set)
13702  {
13706  if (hmat_leaf_node->row_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
13707  {
13708  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
13709  *(hmat_leaf_node->row_indices),
13710  hmat_leaf_node->row_index_global_to_local_map);
13711  }
13712 
13713  if (hmat_leaf_node->col_index_global_to_local_map.size() == 0)
13714  {
13715  build_index_set_global_to_local_map(
13716  *(hmat_leaf_node->col_indices),
13717  hmat_leaf_node->col_index_global_to_local_map);
13718  }
13719 
13720  RefineHMatrixWrtExtendedBlockClusterTree(hmat_leaf_node, hmat_leaf_node);
13721 
13726  if (hmat_leaf_node->submatrices.size() > 0)
13727  {
13735  switch (hmat_leaf_node->type)
13736  {
13737  case FullMatrixType:
13738  {
13739  delete hmat_leaf_node->fullmatrix;
13740  hmat_leaf_node->fullmatrix = nullptr;
13741 
13742  break;
13743  }
13744  case RkMatrixType:
13745  {
13746  delete hmat_leaf_node->rkmatrix;
13747  hmat_leaf_node->rkmatrix = nullptr;
13748 
13749  break;
13750  }
13751  default:
13752  {
13753  Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(hmat_leaf_node->type));
13754 
13755  break;
13756  }
13757  }
13758 
13759  hmat_leaf_node->type = HierarchicalMatrixType;
13760  }
13761  }
13762 
13768  build_leaf_set();
13769 
13774 }
13775 
13776 
13777 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13778 void
13779 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::convert_between_different_block_cluster_trees(
13780  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct1,
13781  BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number> &bct2,
13782  const unsigned int fixed_rank_k2)
13783 {
13788  std::vector<typename BlockClusterTree<spacedim, Number>::node_pointer_type>
13789  target_leaf_set(bct2.get_leaf_set());
13790 
13798  if (bct1.extend_finer_than_partition(target_leaf_set))
13799  {
13800  this->refine_to_supertree();
13801  }
13802 
13808  bool is_bct2_extended = bct2.extend_to_finer_partition(bct1.get_leaf_set());
13809 
13827  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> hmat_new(bct2, std::move(*this));
13828 
13829  if (is_bct2_extended)
13830  {
13835  hmat_new.coarsen_to_partition(target_leaf_set, fixed_rank_k2);
13836  hmat_new.build_leaf_set();
13837 
13843  // std::ofstream out1("target_bct_with_extension.dat");
13844  // bct2.write_leaf_set(out1);
13845  // out1.close();
13846  // std::cout << "=== bct2 with extension ===\n";
13847  // std::cout << "Number of nodes: " << bct2.get_node_num()
13848  // << "\nDepth: " << bct2.get_depth()
13849  // << "\nMax level: " << bct2.get_max_level() <<
13850  // std::endl;
13851  bct2.prune_to_partition(target_leaf_set, true);
13852  // std::ofstream out2("target_bct_after_pruning.dat");
13853  // bct2.write_leaf_set(out2);
13854  // out2.close();
13855  // std::cout << "=== bct2 after pruning ===\n";
13856  // std::cout << "Number of nodes: " << bct2.get_node_num()
13857  // << "\nDepth: " << bct2.get_depth()
13858  // << "\nMax level: " << bct2.get_max_level() <<
13859  // std::endl;
13860  }
13861 
13866  (*this) = std::move(hmat_new);
13867 }
13868 
13869 
13870 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13871 void
13872 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(
13873  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M1,
13874  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *M2)
13875 {
13876  std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
13877  current_hmat_pair(const_cast<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(M1),
13878  const_cast<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>(M2));
13879 
13880  typename std::vector<std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *,
13881  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>>::iterator
13882  matched_hmat_pair_iter =
13883  std::find(Sigma_P.begin(), Sigma_P.end(), current_hmat_pair);
13884 
13885  if (matched_hmat_pair_iter != Sigma_P.end())
13886  {
13887  Sigma_P.erase(matched_hmat_pair_iter);
13888  }
13889 }
13890 
13891 
13892 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13893 void
13894 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::remove_hmat_pair_from_mm_product_list(
13895  const std::pair<const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *,
13896  const HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *> &hmat_pair)
13897 {
13898  typename std::vector<std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *,
13899  HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>>::iterator
13900  matched_hmat_pair_iter =
13901  std::find(Sigma_P.begin(), Sigma_P.end(), hmat_pair);
13902 
13903  if (matched_hmat_pair_iter != Sigma_P.end())
13904  {
13905  Sigma_P.erase(matched_hmat_pair_iter);
13906  }
13907 }
13908 
13909 
13910 template <int spacedim, typename Number>
13911 TreeNodeSplitMode
13912 HMatrix<spacedim, Number>::determine_mm_split_mode_from_Sigma_P()
13913 {
13914  TreeNodeSplitMode initial_split_mode, current_split_mode;
13915 
13916  size_type counter = 0;
13917  for (const std::pair<HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *, HMatrix<spacedim, Number> *>
13918  &hmat_pair : Sigma_P)
13919  {
13920  if ((hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == HorizontalSplitMode &&
13921  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == UnsplitMode) ||
13922  (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode &&
13923  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == HorizontalSplitMode))
13924  {
13925  current_split_mode = HorizontalSplitMode;
13926  }
13927  else if ((hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == UnsplitMode &&
13928  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13929  VerticalSplitMode) ||
13930  (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13931  VerticalSplitMode &&
13932  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode))
13933  {
13934  current_split_mode = VerticalSplitMode;
13935  }
13936  else if ((hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() == CrossSplitMode &&
13937  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13938  CrossSplitMode) ||
13939  (hmat_pair.first->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13940  HorizontalSplitMode &&
13941  hmat_pair.second->bc_node->get_split_mode() ==
13942  VerticalSplitMode))
13943  {
13944  current_split_mode = CrossSplitMode;
13945  }
13946  else
13947  {
13948  Assert(false,
13949  ExcMessage(
13950  "Inconsistent case met during H-matrix MM multiplication"));
13951  }
13952 
13953  if (counter == 0)
13954  {
13955  initial_split_mode = current_split_mode;
13956  }
13957  else if (current_split_mode != initial_split_mode)
13958  {
13959  Assert(false,
13960  ExcMessage(
13961  "Inconsistent case met during H-matrix MM multiplication"));
13962  }
13963 
13964  counter++;
13965  }
13966 
13967  return initial_split_mode;
13968 }
13969 
13970 #endif /* INCLUDE_HMATRIX_H_ */
